tsn: Ke ikemiseditse go tsaya kgato e e nang le bokotsi.

en: We are very grateful for the vaccination, because we work in very difficult conditions.
tsn: Re itumeletse moento thata gonne re dira ka fa tlase ga maemo a a masisi.

en: Sometimes, patients arrives in critical conditions.
tsn: Ka dinako tse dingwe, balwetse ba fitlha ba gateletswe thata.

en: This thing is good, because we can protect ourselves and family as well, the healthcare workers say.
tsn: Selo se se maatla, mme re ka kgona go itshireletsa gammogo le ba malapa a rona, go bua badiri ba tlhokomelo ya boitekanelo.

en: The province has so far received more than 17 000 vaccines.
tsn: Go fitlha ga jaana, porofense e amogetse meento e le 17 000.

en: Manzini says more sites are being opened in preparation for Phase 2 of the programme.
tsn: Manzini a re mafelo a mangwe a a bulwa go baakanyetsa legato la bobedi la Lenaneo le.

en: We managed to vaccinate 16 624.
tsn: Re kgonne to enta 16 624.

en: We are planning to put more sites in the province because so far, we are left with 941 vaccines, that we are busy with.
tsn: Re rulaganya go dira mafelo a mangwe mo porofenseng ka gonne go tla go fitlha jaanong, re saletswe ke meento e le 941 e re santseng re e dirisang.

en: The sites that are left include Evander, and Kwamhlanga.
tsn: Mafelo a a setseng a akaretsa Evander, le Kwamhlanga.

en: We are also opening other sites at Embuleni and Themba Hospital, says the MEC.
tsn: Gape re a go bula mafelo a magwe kwa Embuleni le kwa bookelong jwa kwa Themba, go bua MEC.

en: While expressing satisfaction with how the programme is proceeding so far, Deputy Minister Siweya also acknowledged that more resources are needed.
tsn: Fa a ne a tlhalosa go kgotsofala ga gagwe ka mokgwa o lenaneo le tsweletseng ka ona go fitlha ga jaana, Motlatsa Tona Siweya o amogetse gore go na le tlhokego e e kwa godimo ya didiriswa.

en: I am very much impressed (with) the fact that they were able to designate a site and say this is going to be the vaccination site.
tsn: Ke itumeletse thata ka ntlha ya gore ba ne ba kgona go tlhopha lefelo mme ba re lefelo le, le tla dirisetswa moento.

en: If you are coming to the vaccination there is a different entrance; there is a separation between your normal patients and these ones.
tsn: Fa o tla go enta, go na le mafelo a go tsena a a farologaneng; Go na le kgaogano magareng ga gago le balwetse ba ba tlwaelegileng le ba bangwe.

en: We are really impressed, she says.
tsn: Re kgatlhegile thata, a rialo.

en: The presidency is monitoring the COVID-19 vaccination programme across the country.
tsn: Boporesidente bo tlhokomela lenaneo la moento wa COVID-19 go ralala naga.

en: Currently, the COVID-19 cases worldwide stand at over 134.5 million with more than 108.3 million recoveries and deaths at 2 915 013 million.
tsn: Ga jaanong jaana, dikgetse tsa COVD-19 mo lefatsheng lotlhe di eme go palo e e fetang dimilione di le 134.5 108.3, fa dipalo tsa pholo di feta dimilione di le 108.3 le dintsho di le dimilione di le 2 915 013.

en: In South Africa, the number of confirmed cases has surpassed the 1.5 million mark, whilst the death toll has risen to 53 173.
tsn: Mo Aforikaborwa, palo ya dikgetse tse di tlhomamisitsweng e fetile dimilione tse 1.5, fa palo ya dintsho e tlhatogetse go 53 173.

en: South Africa has the capacity and the scientific muscle to develop its own COVID-19 treatments.
tsn: Aforikaborwa e na le bokgoni jwa saense jwa go ka  tlhama kalafi ya yona ya COVID-19.

en: This emerged during a webinar on the role of scientific research in mitigating the COVID-19 pandemic in the country.
tsn: Seno se tlhageletse ka webinara e ne e le ka ga karolo ya patlisiso ya saense mo go tlhofofatseng lerobororo la COVID-19 mo nageng ya rona.

en: The webinar was attended by the Department of Science and Innovation (DSI) and the South African Health Products Regulatory Authority (SAHPRA).
tsn: Webinara e, e ne e tsenetswe ke ba Lefapha la Saense le Thekenoloji (DSI) le South African Health Products Regulatory Authority (SAHPRA).

en: Department of Science and Innovation Director-General, Dr Phil Mjwara, says he hopes an announcement will be made in the next 18 months on how far it is in terms of ensuring locally-manufactured vaccines.
tsn: Mokaedi-Kakaretso wa Lefapha la Saense le Thekenoloji, Ngk Phil Mjwara, a re o solofela gore kitsiso e tla dirwa mo dikgweding tse 18 tse di latelang, ya gore ba bokgakala jo bo kae ka go netefatsa gore go itlhamelwe meento mo nageng.

en: Dr. Mjwara says it is important to bring together government departments and agencies in order to provide opportunities for the department to better coordinate and communicate complex data sets and analytics.
tsn: Ngaka. Mjwara a re go botlhokwa go kopanya mafapha a puso le ditheo tse di thusang go kgona go tlamela ka ditšhono tsa Lefapha le go gokaganya le go tlhalosa tshedimosetso e e matswakabele le basekaseki ba.

en: SAHPRA Chief Executive Officer, Dr Boitumelo Semete-Makokotlela says they support the initiative for locally manufactured COVID-19 vaccines.
tsn: Motlhankedi Khuduthamaga-Mogolo wa SAHPRA, Ngaka Boitumelo Semete-Makokotlela a re ba tshegetsa itshimololelo ya fa gae ya meento ya COVID-19.

en: I do think also that the country has seen this pandemic as an opportunity really, to have a very clear national strategic intent for us to build this capacity and that’s a key element.
tsn: Ke akanya gape gore naga ya rona e itemogetse leroborobo leno jaaka tšhono ya go nna le maikaelelo a togamaano ya bosetšhaba e e bonalang, go re kgontsha go aga bokgoni jo, mme ke yona karolo ya botlhokwa eo.

en: There’s clearly political will.
tsn: Go mo pepeneneng gore go na le maikaelelo a sepolotiki.

en: There is clearly support from the national government.
tsn: Go mo pepeneneng gore go na le tshegetso e e tswang kwa pusong.

en: There is clearly support from us as a regulator, she says.
tsn: Go mo pepeneneng gore go na le tshegetso go tswa mo go rona jaaka balaodi, a rialo.

en: The SAHPRA says it is currently reviewing Sputnik V, SinoVac, and other vaccines for approval for COVID-19.
tsn: SAHPRA ya re ga jaana e tshwaragane le go sekaseka Sputnik V, SinoVac, le meento e mengwe ya COVID-19 pele e ka rebolwa.

en: South Africa is currently vaccinating healthcare workers with the approved Johnson & Johnson vaccine.
tsn: Aforikaborwa ga jaanong jaana e enta badiri ba tlhokomelo ya boitekanelo ka moento wa Johnson & Johnson o o amogetsweng semmuso.

en: Over 200 000 people have been vaccinated so far.
tsn: Batho ba feta 200 000 ba setse entilwe go fitlha ga jaana.

en: Of the people who were vaccinated, about 17 have reported a COVID-19 positive test and that’s after about 14 days post-vaccination.
tsn: Go batho ba ba entilweng, ba le  17 fa diteko tsa bona COVID-19 di bontshitse fa ba tshwaetsegile, se ke morago ga malatsi a le 14 a go entiwa.

en: We haven’t done a full analysis yet.
tsn: Ga re ise se dire patlisiso e e feletseng.

en: We review results every week, we have passed the halfway mark.
tsn: Re sekaseka dipholo tsa beke nngwe le nngwe, re setse se fetile halofo ya maduo.

en: What we really want to show through this study is how does it work in a real-life setting in the field.
tsn: Se re tota re se batla ke go bontsha ka patlisiso e, ke gore e dira jang mo maemong a botshelo jo bo tlwaelegileng.

en: It prevents you from getting severe disease, almost an 85% protection against severe disease and then it offers 100% protection against death, says Goga.
tsn: E go thibela go bona bolwetse jo bo feteletseng, e go fa tshireletso ya 85% kgatlhanong le bolwetse jo bo tseneletseng mme e neelana ka 100% ya tshireletso kgatlhanong le loso, go bua Goga.

en: About 80% of people have reported the usual reactogenicity side effects that we would expect; fever, headaches, body aches, muscle aches, so these are flu-like symptoms.
tsn: 80% ya batho ba begile ditlamorago tse di tlwaelegileng, tse re neng re di lebeletse; Letshoroma, go opiwa ke tlhogo, mmele o o botlhoko, mesifa e e botlhoko, ka jalo a ke matshwao a mokgotlhwane.

en: We would expect those symptoms.
tsn: Re solofetse go bona ditlamorago tsa mofuta o.

en: We have had a few other side effects like vasovagal attacks where people have fainted.
tsn: Re itemogetse ditlamorago tse di dingwe tse di tshwanang le bolwetsi jwa vasovagal, kwa batho ba neng ba ngatega.

en: We have not seen many, one or two people.
tsn: Ga re ise re bone batho ba le bantsi, a le mongwe kgotsa ba le babedi.

en: Facebook Inc’s platforms including WhatsApp, Messenger and Instagram were down for thousands of users on Thursday, according to outage tracking website Downdetector.com.
tsn: Didiriswa tsa Facebook Inc tse di akaretsang WhatsApp, Messenger le Instagram di ne di sa dire go diketekete tsa badirisi ka Labone, go ya ka webosaete ya Downdetector.com.

en: Reports by users showed more than 112 000 issues on Facebooks website, while 101 000 Instagram users and 516 Whatsapp users reported problems as of 6 pm ET.
tsn: Dipego go tswa go badirisi ba di bontshitse mathata a a fetang 112 000 mo webosaeteng ya Facebooks, fa badirisi ba Instagram ba le 101 000 le badirisi ba WhatsApp ba le 516 ba bagile mathata go tloga ka 6 PM ET.

en: Facebook did not immediately respond to a request for comment.
tsn: Facebook ga e a araba ka nako e e kopilweng go araba ka yona.

en: The outages might be affecting a larger number of users.
tsn: Go sa dire ga tsona go ka ama badirisi ba bantsi thata.

en: The South African Police Service (SAPS) has defended its officers saying they could have been on the scene of the alleged mob justice incident in Zandspruit, north of Johannesburg, earlier had the community not prevented them from getting there.
tsn: Tirelo ya Sepodisi sa Aforikaborwa (SAPS) e sireleditse batlhankedi ba yona ka gore ba ka bo ba ne ba ile kwa lefelong la tiragalo ya tekeko e e belaelwang kwa Zandspruit, Bokone jwa Johannesburg, fa setšhaba se ne se sa ba thibela go ya koo.

en: Earlier a community leader said the incident could have been averted had police responded swiftly.
tsn: Pelenyana, moeteledipele wa setšhaba o rile tiragalo e, e ka bo e sa diragala fa sepodisi se ne se fitlhile ka nako.

en: Community leader in Zandspruit in Gauteng describes as shocking, alleged mob justice incident which left 4 men dead and 5 others critically injured.
tsn: Moeteledipele wa baagi kwa Zandspruit kwa Gauteng, o tlhalositse e le tiragalo e e tshosang ya go batla bosiamisi e e tlogetseng banna  ba le 4 ba tlhokafetse le ba bangwe ba le 5 ba gobetse.

en: Themba Mchunu says police could have done more to avert death of the men who were beaten to death and set alight by some residents.
tsn: Themba Mchunu a re sepodisi se ka bo se dirile go le gontsi go tila loso lwa banna ba ba iteilweng go fitlhelela ba tlhokafala le go fisiwa ga baagi ba bangwe.

en: The incident left four men dead and five others critically injured in the informal settlement on Wednesday.
tsn: Tiragalo e e tlogetse banna ba le bane ba tlhokafetse le ba le batlhano ba gobetse thata kwa mafelong a baipei ka Laboraro.

en: This after, angry residents took nine young men to a local sports ground and beat them up after accusing them of terrorising the community.
tsn: Se ke morago ga gore baagi ba ba neng ba šhakgetse ba tseye banna ba bašwa ba le robonngwe b aba ise kwa lebaleng la metshameko ya selegae mme ba ba itaya morago ga go ba latofatsa ka go sotla setšhaba.

en: The residents also set the men alight.
tsn: Baagi ba ile ba fisa banna ba ka molelo.

en: It’s alleged that about 200 people from the Zandspruit informal settlement attacked a group of 9 boys that they had suspected of robbing people in the area,
tsn: Batho ba ka nna 200 go tswa kwa lefelong la baipei kwa Zandspruit ba latofaditswe ka go tlhasela setlhopha sa basimane ba le 9 ba ba neng ba belaelwa ka go kgothosa batho mo lefelong.

en: Police spokesperson, Kay Makhubele says there is no excuse.
tsn: Mmueledi wa sepodisi, Kay Makhubele a re ga go na lebaka.

en: The sector vehicle indeed went to the scene after they called and about 200 people stoned the vehicle and it made a U-turn and called a backup thats when people disperse from the ground.
tsn: Koloi ya Setheo e ile kwa lefelong la tiragalo morago ga go bidiwa mme batho ba ba ka nnang 200 ba ne ba tlhasela sejanaga seo ka matlapa mme se ile sa boela morago go ya go batla thuso, ke moo batho ba ileng ba phatlalala gona.

en: If the police are not responding we have got a protocol to follow, if they are not getting help from the police they must go to the station commander and talk to him or the district commander.
tsn: Fa sepodisi se sa arabe go na le tsamaiso e e tshwanetseng go latelwa, fa ba sa bone thuso go tswa go sepodisi ba tshwanetse go etela Molaodi wa seteišene go bua le ene kgotsa Molaodi wa kgaolo.

en: So they cannot give excuses of killing people because police are not responding.
tsn: Ka jalo ga ba kake ba dira maipato a gore ba bolaile batho gonne sepodisi se ne se sa ba tlhage thuso.

en: Professor Goga says, in South Africa, people have implemented behavioural changes for the betterment of their future health.
tsn: Moporofesara Goga a re mo Aforikaborwa, batho ba setse ba tsentse tirisong diphetogo tsa boitsholo go tokafatsa boitekanelo jwa bona mo isagweng.

en: It has taken a pandemic to teach us that health is not just the absence of disease.
tsn: Go tsere leroborobo go re ruta gore boitekanelo ga se fela go tlhokega ga bolwetse.

en: It is a state of social, physical and social well-being.
tsn: Ke maemo a go itekanela ga loago le mo mmeleng.

en: It has taken a pandemic to show us that health is inter-connected.
tsn: Go tsere leroborobo gore bontsha gore boitekanelo bo kopanetswe.

en: No one is healthy until everybody is healthy.
tsn: Ga go na motho yo o tla itekanelang ba bangwe ba sa itekanela.

en: Health for all is something we really need to strive for.
tsn: Boitekanelo jwa botlhe ke se re tshwanetseng go se lwela.

en: We have not attained it yet.
tsn: Ga re ise re bo fitlhelele.

en: The country has also recorded 37 new COVID-19-related fatalities on Tuesday.
tsn: Naga e rekotile dintsho tse dintšhwa tse 37 tse di amanang le COVID-19 ka Labobedi.

en: This brings the total number of deaths to 53 032.
tsn: Se se isa palogotlhe ya dintsho go 53 032.

en: Recoveries currently stand at 1 478 820.
tsn: Dipalo tsa pholo di eme go 1 478 820.

en: The cumulative number of tests conducted to date is 9 995 431.
tsn: Palo ya diteko tse di dirilweng go fitlha ga jaana ke 9 995 431.

en: The number of healthcare workers vaccinated under the Sisonke Protocol stands at 272 438.
tsn: Palo ya badiri ba tlhokomelo ya boitekanelo ba ba entilweng go ya ka porotokolo ya Sisonke e eme go 272, 438.

en: Health Minister Dr Zweli Mkhize recently said governments target was to vaccinate 67%of the population by the end of this year.
tsn: Tona ya boitekanelo Ngaka Zweli Mkhize bošeng jaana  o rile maikaelelo a puso e ne e le go enta 67% ya baagi kwa bokhutlong jwa ngwaga ono.

en: DA Member of Parliament and Spokesperson on Health, Siviwe Gwarube, says the SAHRC must investigate, what she terms, governments failure to uphold the rights of South Africans.
tsn: Tokololo ya Palamente ya DA le mmueledi wa tsa boitekanelo, Siviwe Gwarube a re, SAHRC e tshwanetse go batlisisa se a se bitsang a re ke go retelelwa ga puso go diragatsa ditshwanelo tsa MaAforikaborwa.

en: According to the Health Department, over 272 000 healthcare workers in the country have been vaccinated thus far.
tsn: Go ya ka Lefapha la Pholo badiri ba tlhokomelo ya boitekanelo ba feta 272, 000 mo nageng ya rona ba setse ba entilwe go fitlha ga jaana.

en: Some experts say the country will need up to as many as 250 000 vaccines every single day over the next three to four months to meet its inoculation target.
tsn: Baitseanape bangwe ba re naga e tla tlhoka meento e ka nna 250 000 letsatsi le letsatsi mo dikgweding tse tharo go ya go di le nne go fitlhelela maikaelelo a yona a meento.

en: Professor Tulio de Oliveira from the KwaZulu-Natal Research and Innovation Sequencing Platform says the country needs to quickly move towards vaccinating the general population.
tsn: Moporofesara Tulio de Oliveira go tswa kwa setheong sa dipatlisiso kwa KwaZulu-Natal a re naga e tlhoka go fitlha kwa maemong a go enta setšhaba ka kakaretso ka bonako.

en: The Minister of Health, Dr Zweli Mkhize, and WHO Director in Africa, Dr Matshidiso Moeti, will host a World Health Day webinar.
tsn: Tona ya Boitekanelo, Ngaka Zweli Mkhize le Mokaedi wa WHO mo Aforikaborwa, e leng Ngaka Matshidiso Moeti, ba tla tshwara webinara ya letsatsi la bosetšhaba la boitekanelo.

en: The webinar is aimed at creating awareness about the health inequities and strengthen efforts towards more inclusive approach for Universal Health Coverage and health security in South Africa.
tsn: Webinara e e ikaelela go tlhola temoso ka ga boitekanelo le tekatekano le go maatlafatsa matsapa a go akaretsa botlhe go tsa boitekanelo le pabalesego ya pholo mo Aforikaborwa.

en: Dr Zweli Mkhize says a million Johnson & Johnson vaccines to arrive in April
tsn: Ngaka Zweli Mkhize a re meento e le milione ya Johnson & Johnson e tla goroga ka Moranang.

en: Winde says, I [we] need to have many more vaccines so we can get back to work.
tsn: Winde a re, ke [re] tlhoka go nna le meento gore re kgone go boela tirong.

en: Of course, it is a competitive place as we as a province are trying to procure our own vaccines.
tsn: Ke nnete gore re mo kgaisanong jaaka rona re le porofense le leka go bona meento ya rona.

en: At the end of the month, we had 28 companies and wholesalers that we contacted.
tsn: Kwa bokhutlong jwa kgwedi re ne re se setse re ikgolantse le ditlamo di le barekisi ba le 28.

en: I suppose we use the Sisonke programme to see our readiness.
tsn: Ke akanya gore re dirisa lenaneo la Sisonke go bona gore re ipaakantse go le kana kang.

en: We are expecting another 30 000 vaccines now as part of the J&J rollout.
tsn: Re solofetse meento e mengwe e le 30 000 jaaka karolo ya J & J go simolola.

en: Thousands of people have flocked back home after spending time at various holiday destinations over the weekend.
tsn: Diketekete tsa batho di boetse kwa gae morago ga go iketla kwa mafelong a a farologaneng a boikhutso mo mafelong a beke.

en: Epidemiologist, Dr Jo Barnes, says the extensive movement of people may have caused the further spread of COVID-19.
tsn: Ngaka ya malwetse a leroborobo, Ngaka Jo Barnes, a re go tlalatlala ga batho go ka tswa go bakile go anama ga mogare wa COVID-19

en: Please be a responsible citizen and watch out for any symptoms.
tsn: Ka kopo nna moagi yo o nang le maikarabelo o lebelele matshwao.

en: If you feel even slightly fluish, try and isolate yourself and have the least amount of contact with other people and have yourself tested.
tsn: Fa o ikutlwa okare o na le mokgotlhwane, leka  itlhaola le go nna le kgolagano e nnye le batho ba bangwe mme o ye go tlhatlhobiwa.

en: Mokonyane describes Mofokengs passing as a great loss.
tsn: Mokonyane o tlhalosa fa go tlhokafala ga Mofokeng e le ditshenyegelo tse dikgolo.

en: Firstly, condolences to the Mofokeng and Moseneke family.
tsn: Sa ntlha, Matshediso go ba lelapa la ga Mofokeng le Moseneke.

en: We are here as the members of the ANC, ANC Women’s League to pay our respect on the sudden departure of comrade Jacqui and her loving daughter Thato.
tsn: Re fano jaaka ditokololo tsa Lekoko la ANC, Mokgatlho wa Basadi wa ANC ka tlotla mabapi le tatlhegelo ya tshoganyetso ya ga khomoreiti Jacqui le morwadie wa gagwe yo a rategang Thato.

en: Unfortunately, we can’t actually give her the send-off that we would have all loved to give her.
tsn: Ka bomadimabe, re retelelwa ke go mo robatsa ka tsele e re neng re ratile go mo robatsa ka yona.

en: We are here now to just say to the family we are with you.
tsn: Re fano gajaana go tla go raya ba lelapa gore rena le bona.

en: When the right time comes as in line with the family request we will come back and celebrate the good times and the fond memories we have of comrade Jacqui, she says
tsn: Fa go sena go bipologa, go ya ka kopo ya ba lelapa re tlile go boa mme re keteke dinako tse dintle le megopolo e re nang le yona  ya ga Khomoreiti Jacqui, o bua jalo.

en: ANC Women’s League leader, Bathabile Dlamini, says Mofokeng leaves behind a lasting legacy.
tsn: Moeteledipele wa Mokgatlho wa Basadi wa ANC, Bathabile Dlamini, a re Mofokeng o itlogetse motlhala wa bosakhutleng.

en: She also turned around the campaign on violence against women.
tsn: Gape, o fetotse lewa ka go nna le letsholo kgatlhanong le tshotlakako ya basadi.

en: The family says Mofokeng was not that ill.
tsn: Lelapa la re Mofokeng o ne a sa gatelelwa.

en: She was due to finish her quarantine period the following day when she was found dead at her home.
tsn: O ne a feleletsa malatsi a gagwe a le mo khwaranthaeneng letsatsi le le latelang fa a tlaa fitlhelwa a ragile thokolo kwa gagagwe.

en: The family says she did not take well to the passing of her only child Thato.
tsn: Lelapa la re ga le a tsewa sentle ke go tlhokafala ga ngwana wa gagwe Thato.

en: Family spokesperson, Thoko Moloto says the family is still coming to terms with the double tragedy
tsn: : Mmueledi wa lelapa, Thoko Moloto a re ba lelapa ba sa ntse ba tshositswe ke tiragalo e e botlhoko jaana.

en: As you can understand it’s very difficult for the family and it’s been a double blow.
tsn: Jaaka o tlhaloganya, go bokete mo lelapeng ke go latlhegelwa ke batho ba le babedi.

en: It was hard enough for the family to accept Thato’s passing but then to accept that of Jacqui was a, for a lack of better word, a blow, a double blow.
tsn: Go ne go se bonolo mo lelapeng go amogela loso lwa ga Thato le go amogela gape la ga Jacqui  e ne e le go felelwa ke mafoko fela, go rathwa, go rathwa ke tladi gabedi.

en: I don’t know what’s going to take for the family to come to terms with what has just hit us.
tsn: Go tlaa tsaya lelapa nako gore le fete mo maemong a satswang go ba padimola

en: Mofokeng will be buried tomorrow in Pretoria, while her daughter will be cremated on Wednesday
tsn: Mofokeng o tlaa bewa ka moso kwa Pitori, fa morwadie ena a tlaa tshubiwa ka Laboraro.

en: The Democratic Alliance (DA) has called on President Cyril Ramaphosa to institute an urgent investigation into allegations that Defence and Military Veterans Minister, Nosiviwe Mapisa-Nqakula, wasted millions of taxpayers’ money on chartered flights and luxury accommodation.
tsn: Lekoko la Tshwaragano ya Temokerasi (DA) le ikuetse mo go Moporesidente Cyril Ramaphosa go potlakileng patlisiso mabapi le ditatofatso tsa Tona ya Sesole, Nosiviwe Mapisa-Nqakula, ka go tshenyo ya dimilione tsa madi a baduelalekgetho ka go a dirisa go pagama difofoane le marobalo a manobonobo

en: DA Shadow Defence Minister, Kobus Marais, says dossier of evidence has been submitted to the Joint Standing Committee on Defence, detailing at least five instances where doubt can be cast over Mapisa-Nqakulas actions.
tsn: Tona ya Tshireletso ya DA, Kobus Marais, a re rekoto ya bosupi e romeletswe kwa Komiting ya leruri e e kopaneng le ya Tshireletso, e e rweleng bonnye jwa dikgetse di le tlhano tsa mabaka a go ka tsewang dikgato mo go Mapisa-Nqakula

en: He says this is in addition to evidence submitted before that she allegedly extorted more than R5 million from an SANDF service provider.
tsn: A re se se mo godimo ga go bosupi bo diragetse extorted go feta R5 milione go tswa mo SANDF se se tlamelang ka ditirelo.

en: Holomisa implicates Minister Mapisa-Nqakula in a R5 million scandal
tsn: Holomisa o golaganya Tonakgolo Mapisa-Nqakula ka didikadike tsa diranta di le tlhano (R5 million)

en: Political analyst Moeletsi Mbeki says South Africa needs a review of governance to fully realise the meaning of democracy to the benefit of all in the country
tsn: Moitseanape wa polotiki Moeletsi Mbeki a re Aforikaborwa e tlhoka tshekatsheko mo pusong go bipolola bokao jwa temokerasi go nna le seabe go botlhe mo nageng.

en: Mbeki asserts that for many South Africans, democracy has proved to be an illusion.
tsn: Mbeki o netefatsa gore Maaforikaborwa a le mantsi, temokerasi e itshupile go nna sa tsietsego

en: The Deputy Chair of the South African Institute of International Affairs view is that discouragement is also shown in the poor voter turnout.
tsn: Kakanyo ya Motlatsa Modulasetulo wa Setheo sa Aforikaborwa sa merero ya boditšhabatšhaba ke gore go nyemisa mooko go itshupa mo dipalopalong tsa batlhophi.

en: Mbeki dissects his Business Day article on problems bedevilling the country’s democracy ahead of the Freedom Day commemorations on Tuesday.
tsn: Mbeki o tlhaola athikele ya gagwe kgwebo ya gagwe ya letsatsi le letsatsi mo nageng e e nang le mathata a a bedevilling ’ S temokerasi ya pele ga letsatsi la kgololosego maloba ka Labobedi.

en: The African National Congress (ANC) North West Interim Provincial Committee (IPC ) has called on former premier and party provincial chairperson, Supra Mahumapelo, to refrain from contravening the party’s constitution.
tsn: Komiti ya nakwana ya Porofense ya Bokonebophirima (IPC) e tsentse boikuelo go Tonakgolo ya porofense le Modulasetulo wa maloba Supra Mahumapelo go lesa go gataka molaotheo wa lekoko.

en: Mahumapelo is currently attending a disciplinary hearing alongside ANC Woman’s League Secretary, Bitsang Lenkopane, for allegedly holding a meeting in Mareetsane near where the IPC had organised an event.
tsn: Mahumapelo ga jaana o lebanwe ke dikgato-kgalemo mmogo le Mokwaledi wa Lekgotlha la Basadi la ANC, Bitsang Lenkopane, go tshwara kopano kwa Mareetsane gaufi le fa ICP e neng e tshwaretse kopano teng

en: Yesterday, Mahumapelo told branch delegates in Delareyville that he believed the process was aimed at damaging his reputation.
tsn: Maabane, Mahumapelo. O boleletse baemedi ba lekala kwa Delareyville gore o dumela fa thulaganyo e e ne e totile go senya serodumo sa gagwe.

en: Spokesperson for the ANC IPC, Kenny Morolong, however, says Mahumapelo has no regard for the party’s constitution.
tsn: Mmueledi wa Komiti ya nakwana ya Porofense ya Bokonebophirima (IPC) wa ANC, Kenny Morolong, le fa go le jalo, a re Mahumapelo o nyefola molaotheo wa lekoko.

en: This comrade undermines the decision and the directives of the IPC and the NEC
tsn: Le Khomoreiti le le nyatsa tshwetso le dikaelo tsa IPC le NEC.

en: He has absolutely no regards for the ANC constitution, he has no regard for the ANC structures.
tsn: O tota a nyefola molaotheo wa ANC, ga a na tlotla ya tsamaiso ya ANC.

en: His recent rents justify why the IPC decided to subject him to the disciplinary processes.
tsn: Dirente tsa gagwe tsa mo malobeng di netefatsa gore ke goreng Komiti ya nakwana ya Porofense ya Bokonebophirima (IPC) e sweditse go mo isa kwa dikgato-kgalemong.

en: Comrade Mahumapelo without him the ANC of his imagination cannot be led.
tsn: Kwa ntle ga Khomoreiti Mahumapelo ANC ya dikakanyo tsa gagwe e ka se buswe.

en: We wish to issue a stand warning that we will not be held at ransom, adds Morolong.
tsn: Re eletsa go emela ntlha ya gore ga re kitla re nna e e neng e tshwaretswe kwa ransom, o oketsa jalo Morolong.

en: During his address to his supporters yesterday, Mahumapelo accused the ANC of violating the Constitution, saying some of the party’s resolutions are in conflict with the law.
tsn: Mo puong ya gagwe le balatedi ba gagwe maabane, Mahumapelo o latofatsa fa ANC e gatakaka Molaotheo, a re dingwe tsa ditshwetso tsa lekoko ga di tsamaelane le molao.

en: Supra Mahumapelo briefs branches on recent suspension of a number of prominent ANC members.
tsn: Supra Mahumapelo o loma makala tsebe mabapi le go sekegiwa.

en: African National Congress (ANC) Deputy Secretary-General Jessie Duarte has lashed out at the Democratic Alliance (DA) for saying changing street names is a waste of taxpayers’ money.
tsn: Motlatsa Mokwaledi-Kakaretso wa Lekoko la AND Jessie Duarte ga inyalane le ba DA gore go fetola maina a melelwana ke tshenyo ya madi a baduedi ba lekgetho

en: Duarte and ANC Women’s League members have signed a petition to change William Nicole Drive in Fourways, north of Johannesburg, to Winnie Madikizela-Mandela Drive.
tsn: Duarte le maloko a Mokgatlho wa Basadi wa ANC ba saenile phetišine go fetola Tselana ya William Nicole e e maphatha mane, Bokone ya Johannesburg, gonna ya Winnie Madikizela Mandela.

en: They have gathered at the biggest intersection of William Nicole Drive and the N1 Pretoria Road, where are they are lobbying for support for the name change.
tsn: Ba kokoanetse kwa tselana kgolo ya William Nicol le N1 mo Pitori, kwa ba kopang tshegetso ya gore leina lefetolwe.

en: Comrade Jessie Duarte leads the mobilisation of communities in Gauteng in support of changing the name of William Nicol Drive to Winnie Madikizela Mandela Drive & the launch of an online petition for the name change.
tsn: Khomoreiti Jessie Duarte, o eteletse pele letsholo la baagi mo Gauteng go tshegetsa phetolo ya leina la Tselana ya William Nicole go nna Winnie Madikizela Mandela le go thankgolola phetišine mo inthaneteng go fetola leina.

en: The DA has launched an online petition to oppose the timing of the renaming, saying it will be a costly undertaking amid the coronavirus pandemic.
tsn: DA e tlhankgolotse phetišene mo inthaneteng go ganetsana le kakanyo ya go fetolwa ga leina, ka gore e tlile go nna kgato e e tlhokang madi a mantsi re le mo leroborobong la khorona.

en: Addressing the crowd earlier, Duarte said: The DA’s four thousand signatures against millions of people, let’s see who will actually come out better.
tsn: Fa a bua le matshwithitshwithi go se gale, Duarte o rile: DA e iponetse mesaeno e le dikete di le nne kgatlhanong le didikadike tsa batho, a re bone b aba tlaa itlhaolang mo go ba bangwe botoka.

en: The people of South Africa will change this road to Winnie Madikizela-Mandela.
tsn: Batho ba Aforikaborwa ba tlile go fetola tsela e go nna Winnie Madikizela Mandela.

en: ANCWL lobbies support for the renaming of William Nicol Drive.
tsn: ANCWL e lopa tshegetso ya go fetola tsela ya William Nicol.

en: They have gathered at the biggest intersection of William Nicole Drive and the N1 Pretoria Road, where are they are lobbying for support for the name change.
tsn: Ba kokoanetse kwa tselana kgolo ya William Nicol le N1 `mo Pitori, kwa ba kopang tshegetso ya gore leina lefetolwe.

en: Addressing a crowd earlier, Duarte said: Many people who live here are very comfortable, nothing has changed for them.
tsn: Duarte o ne a neela morafe wa batho puo e se kgale, Duarte o rile: Batho ba le bantsi ba ba nnang mo ba tshela sentle, ga go na sepe se se fetogileng mo go bona.

en: But we are going to change this road, we are calling this road, Winnie Madikizela-Mandela Road.
tsn: Mme re tlile go fetola tsela e, re e bitsa, Winnie Madikizela Mandela.

en: We have to challenge the fact that we need to make sure that our economy is driven by black South Africans.
tsn: Re tshwanetse go itebaganya le ntlha ya gore re netefatse fa ikonomi ya rona e laolwa ke Bantsho ba Maaforikaborwa.

en: It isn’t right that there’s still an economy that is still in the hands of a minority, explains Duarte.
tsn: Ga go a tshwanela gore le jaana ikonomi e santse e le mo diatleng tse di sele, ga tlhalosa Duarte.

en: Chairperson of the African National Congress (ANC) in Ekurhuleni Mzwandile Masina has called on the ANC National Executive Committee to rethink the step aside resolution.
tsn: Modulasetulo wa Lekoko la Bosetšhaba la ANC kwa Ekurhuleni Mzwandile Masina o tsentse boikuelo go Komiti Khuduthamaga ya Bosetšhaba go akanye sešwa ka ga tshwetso ya go sekegwa ga maloko.

en: ANC Secretary-General Ace Magashule is facing corruption, fraud and money laundering charges linked to a multi-million-rand contract to remove asbestos roofing from houses when he Free State premier.
tsn: Mokwaledi-Kakaretso wa ANC Ace Magashule o lebanwe ke ditatofatso tsa bosenyi, boferefere le go tlhatswa madi a seng mo molaong a golaganngwang le konteraka ya didikadike tsa dimilone tsa diranta go tlosa dithulelo tsa asebesetose mo matlong fa e ne e le Tonakgolo ya Foreisetata.

en: Magashule is one of ANC leaders who have until the end of this month to step aside until their corruption cases are finalised.
tsn: Magashule ke mongwe wa baetapele ba ANC ba ba neetsweng go fitlha kgwedi e ya fifing gore e be ba sekegwa go fitlha dikgetse tsa bona di konoseditswe.

en: In his address to the media on the sidelines of the ANC Cadres Regional Assembly in Alberton on Sunday, Masina said Magashule should be given a chance to state his case.
tsn: Mo puong ya gagwe le babegadikgang tebang le matogwana a Makgotlha a ANC kwa Alberton ka Sontaga, Masina o rile Magashiule o tshwanetse go newa tšhono ya go tlhagisa letlhakore la gagwe.

en: Comrade Ace has not been found guilty.
tsn: Khomoreiti Ace ga a ise a bonwe molato.

en: I believe he must be given an opportunity to be heard and for his case to be listened to. I don’t believe that we must fire leaders on Zoom.
tsn: Ke dumela gore o tshwanetse go newa tšhono ya go reetswa le gore go reetswe ka ga kgetse ya gagwe. Ga ke dumele gore re tshwanetse go rosa baeteledipele tiro mo Zoom.

en: The leadership must sit down, and they must engage because the outcome of Nasrec can never be ignored, said Masina.
tsn: Baetapele ba tshwanetse go nna fa fatshe, le go utlwana ka gonne ditlamorago tsa Nasrec di ka se ikgatolosiwe, a rialo Masina.

en: Meanwhile, the ANC in Ekurhuleni says it fears that the step-aside policy will plunge the organisation into chaos.
tsn: Re sa ntse re le foo, ANC kwa Ekurhuleni ba re ba tshosiwa ke gore molawana wa go sekegwa ga maloko o tlile go tlisa mathata mo mokgatlhong.

en: There’s also a concern the resolution will create problems for councillor selection in branch meetings.
tsn: Go na gape  le matshwenyego a gore tshwetso e e tlile go tlisa mathata mo tlhophong ya mokhanselara mo dikopanong tsa lekala.

en: The Fezile Dabi District Municipality says it will interdict the ANC if Magashule steps aside.
tsn: Sedika sa Mmasepala wa Fezile Dabi  wa ree tlile go thapola ANC fa Magashule a ka sekegwa.

en: Branches in the region have gone a step further by accusing the NEC of being selective in the implementation of the step-aside resolution.
tsn: Makala a a mo kgaolong a tsere kgato go ya pele ka go latofatsa Komiti Khuduthamaga ya Bosetšhaba (NEC) ka go ke tsaya letlhakore tebang le go tsenngwa tirisong ga tshwetso ya go sekegwa ga maloko.

en: Regional Convener Jabu Sigasa says branches want an urgent National General Council to deliberate on Magashule’s future.
tsn: Mmitsalekgotlha wa Kgaolo Jabu Sigasa a re makalana a lopa ka tshoganyetso Khansele ya Kakaretso ya Bosetšhaba go akanya sentle ka ga bokamoso jwa ga Magashule.

en: The African National Congress (ANC) Fezile Dabi regional co-ordinator in the Free State, Reagan Booysen’s, says they have consulted all the ANC branches in the province in making sure that the party’s secretary-general, Ace Magashule, gets the maximum support that Booysens says  he deserves.
tsn: Mogokaganyimogolo wa kgaolo ya Fezile Dabi wa Lekoko la Bosetšhaba (ANC) Fezile Dabi kwa Foreisetata, Morulaganyi wa Kgaolo mo Foreisetata, Reagan Booysen, a re ba etetse makalana otlhe a ANC mo porofenseng go netefatsa fa Mokwaledi-Kakaretso wa lekoko Ace Magashule, a bona tshegetso ya maemo a a kwa godimo e Booysens a kayang fa e mo tshwanela.

en: region says it will interdict the ANC’s National Executive Committees (NEC) stance on the step aside resolution.
tsn: Kgaolo e, ya re e tlile go kgoreletsa Komiti Khuduthamaga ya Bosetšhaba (NEC) go emisa tshwetso ya go sekegwa.

en: This comes as the 30-day period during which Magashule must step aside fast runs out.
tsn: Se se tla jaaka letsatsi la masomeamararo la paka e Magashule a e beetsweng gore a emele fa thoko ka ponyo ya leitlho.

en: Magashule is facing corruption charges among others.
tsn: Magashule o lebanwe ke ditatofatso tsa bosenyi gareng ga tse dingwe.

en: Addressing the media in Parys, Booysens said: We are going to interdict that [step aside] thing, we just waiting for the due date, and we are going to interdict that decision.
tsn: Booysens mo puong ya gagwe le ba bobegakgang kwa Parys, o rile: Re tlile go kgoreletsa tshwetso e ya [go sekegiwa], re emetse letlha la bofelo re be re kgoreletsa tshwetso eo.

en: Former African National Congress (ANC) Chairperson and Premier of the North West, Supra Mahumapelo, says the ANC is violating the constitution.
tsn: Modulasetulo le Tonakgolo ya maloba ya Lekoko la Bosetšhaba (ANC), Supra Mahumapelo, a re ANC e gataka molaotheo.

en: Mahumaphelo says some of the party’s resolutions are in conflict with the law.
tsn: Mahumaphelo a re ditshwetso dingwe tsa lekoko ga di inyalane le molao.

en: Addressing ANC branch members in Delareyville, Mahumapelo called on the National Executive Committee (NEC) of the party to intervene.
tsn: Puo ya gagwe le makala a ANC kwa Delareyville, Mahumapelo o tsentse boikuelo go ba Komiti Khuduthamaga ya Bosetšhaba (NEC) ya lekoko le le go tseleganya.

en: The suspended Mahumapelo was referring to the so-called step-aside resolution, which orders ANC leaders accused of corruption or serious crimes to voluntarily step aside.
tsn: Go sekegiwa ga Mahumapelo go ne go kaiwa e le tharabololo, e e layang baetapele ba ANC b aba latofatswang ka bosenyi kgotsa bogodu jo bo tseneletseng go emela kwa thoko.

en: Some parts of the resolutions are in conflict with the law and life must go on.
tsn: Dikarolo tse dingwe tsa ditharabololo ga di inyalane le molao e bile re tshwanetse go itshela moriti o o tsididi.

en: In my own view as SOR Mahumapelo from ward 6,7,12, I’m saying part of that resolution in conflict with the law must be suspended until we go to the next national conference, he says.
tsn: Go ya ka pono ya me jaaka SOR Mahumapelo go tswa wotong 6,7,12, ka re karolo nngwe ya tshwetso eo ga e inyalane le molao e tshwanetse go emisiwa go fitlhela re ya kwa khonferenseng ya bosetšhaba e e latelang, o bua jalo.

en: Mahumapelo says they have applied for the suspension to be set aside.
tsn: Mahumapelo a re ba dirile kopo ya go sekegwa go beelwa kwa thoko.

en: Mahumapelo added that suspending the step-aside resolution will lead to proper engagement between members of the ANC.
tsn: Mahumapelo o tlatsa ka gore kemiso ya tshwetso ya go sekegiwa ga maloko e tlile go tlisa kamano e e siameng magareng ga maloko a ANC.

en: If you suspend parts of the resolution which are in conflict with the law, the ANC is achieving two things: 1) it is complying with its resolution, at the same time, it is complying with the law of the republic.
tsn: Fa o emisa dikarolo tsa ditshwetso tse di sa inya;laneng le molao, ANC e boela ke dilo tse pedi: 1) ke go inyalana le tshwetso ya yona, ka fa go le lengwe, ke go inyalana le Molao wa Rephaboliki.

en: What you must do then is that people who are accused, who are arrested, the leadership must come then and master the art of the necessary political engagement.
tsn: Se o tshwanetseng go se dira ke gore batho ba ba latofadiwang, ba ba tshwerweng, boeteledipele bo tshwanetse go tla le go tlhaloganya tsamaiso ya sepolotiki

en: Mahumapelo was temporarily suspended from the ANC last week for contradicting the North West Interim Provincial Committee, who had ordered the Mayor of JB Marks Local Municipality Mayor to resign over corruption charges.
tsn: Mahumapelo o sekegilwe nakwana mo ANC beke e e fetileng go ngangisana Komiti ya nakwana ya Porofense mo Bokonebophirima, yo a laetseng Meiyara wa Selegae wa JB Marks go rola tiro ka ntlha ya ditatofatso tsa bosenyi.

en: His disciplinary hearing is set down for Monday and Tuesday.
tsn: Theeletso ya gagwe ya dikgato-kgalemo e le ka Mosupologo le Labobedi.

en: Mahumapelo briefs branches on recent suspension of a number of prominent ANC members.
tsn: Mahumapelo o loma tsebe makalana ka ga go sekegwa ga maloko a le mmalwa a a itsegeng a ANC.

en: Politically and legally embattled African National Congress (ANC) Secretary-General Ace Magashule’s home region Fezile Dabi says it will interdict the party’s National Executive Committee (NEC) if Magashule steps aside.
tsn: Go ya ka sepolotiki le molao legae la Mokwaledi-kakaretso  wa Lekoko la Bosetšhaba (ANC) Ace Magashule Fezile Dabi la re ba tlile go kgoreletsa  Komiti Khuduthamaga ya Bosetšhaba (NEC) fa Magashule a ka sekegiwa.

en: Magashule is one of ANC leaders who have until the end of this month to step aside until their corruption cases are finalised.
tsn: Magashule ke mongwe wa baetapele ba ANC ba ba neetsweng go fitlha kgwedi e ya fifing gore e be ba sekegwa go fitlha dikgetse tsa bona di konoseditswe

en: The Regional Task team says it has consulted branches on the political tussles in the ANC and Magashule’s future.
tsn: Setlhopha sa tiro sa kgaolo sa re se etetse makalana a bakgaratlhi ba sepolotiki mo ANC le bokamoso jwa ga Magashule.

en: The majority of the branches say the ANC must be served with an interdict to prevent Magashule from stepping aside as he faces fraud, corruption and money laundering charges.
tsn: Bontsi jwa makala ba re ANC e tshwanetse go kgoreletswa to sireletsa Magashule gore a se ke a sekegwa ka ntlha ya fa a lebanwe ke ditatofatso tsa tsietso, bosenyi, le go tlhatswa madi a a seng mo molaong.

en: Branches of the ANC gave the RTT a mandate, the leadership must ensure that such a mandate is implemented.
tsn: Makala a ANC a neetse ba RTT taelo, boeteledipele bo tshwanetse go netefatsa gore taelo e e ntseng jalo e tsenngwa tirisong

en: We just waiting for the due date and we are going to interdict that decision because we know the decisions we took at Nasrec and braches are talking about interdicting because of the decisions they took, says Deputy Regional Coordinator, Reagan Booysens.
tsn: Re letetse fela letlha la bofelo mme re tlile go kgoreletsa tshwetso eo ka gonne re itse ditshwetso tse re di tsereng kwa Nasrec le makalana a bua ka kiletso e ka ntlha ya ditshwetso tse ba di tsereng, ga bua jalo Motlatsa Morulaganyi wa kgaolo, Reagan Booysens.

en: Branches in Fezile Dabi have gone a step further by accusing the ANC NEC of being selective in the implementation of the step-aside resolution.
tsn: Makala a kwa Fezile Dabi a tsere kgato go ya pele ka go latofatsa Komiti Khuduthamaga ya Bosetšhaba tebang le go tsaya letlhakore ka ga tshwetso ya go sekegwa ga maloko.

en: Regional Convener, Jabu Sigasa, says branches want an urgent National General Council to deliberate on Magashule’s future
tsn: Mogokaganyimogolo wa kgaolo Jabu Sigaga a re makalana a batla ka tshoganyetso gore Khansele ya Kakaretso ya Bosetšhaba go go akanya sentle bokamoso jwa ga Magashule.

en: We are calling for an urgent NGC to sit where ANC branches will be consulted on this step-aside.
tsn: Re tsenya boikuelo jwa tshoganyetso go NGC go nna fa fatshe kwa go tlaa kopanang makala a mangwe tebang le tshwetso e ya go sekegwa ga maloko.

en: The Fezile Dabi Region has also endorsed the Provincial Chairperson Sam Mashinini’s decision to appeal the Supreme Court judgment disbanding the Provincial Executive Committee.
tsn: Kgaolo ya Fezile Dabi e letleletse tshwetso ya Modulasetulo wa Porofense Sam Mashinini go dira boikuelo kgatlhanong le katlholo ya kgotlatshekelo go fedisa Komiti Khuduthamaga ya porofense.

en: Former ANC chairperson and North West premier Supra Mahumapelo has arrived at the Delareyville Town Hall where he is set to brief branches about his suspension and that of other prominent ANC members by the party’s Interim Provincial Committee (IPC).
tsn: Modulasetulo wa maloba wa ANC le Bokonebophirima Tonakgolo Supra Mahumapelo. O gorogile kwa Holong ya Toropo ya Delareyville fa a rulagantseng go loma makala ka ga gosekegiwa ga gagwe le maloko a mangwe a ANC  ke Komiti ya nakwana ya Porofence.

en: He is joined by ANC Women’s League Provincial Secretary, Bitsa Lenkopane, who is also facing disciplinary charges.
tsn: O tshwaragane le Mokwaledi wa Lekgotla la Basadi la ANC, Bitsa Lenkopane, yo gape a lebanweng ke kgalemo.

en: Mahumapelo’s ANC membership was suspended earlier in the week after he allegedly told JB Marks Local Municipality Mayor Kgotso Khumalo, not to step aside over the fraud and corruption cloud that’s hanging over his head.
tsn: Botokololo jwa ga Mahumapelo mo ANC bo emisitswe go sa le gale mo bekeng morago ga go bolelela Tona ya Mmasepala wa JB Marks, Kgotso  Khumalo, gore a seke a sekegiwa ka ntlha ya tsietso le bonweenwee jo a latofadiwang ka bona.

en: Mahumapelo’s supporters cry foul following his suspension.
tsn: Balatedi ba ga Mahumapelo ba gana nang ya banyana ka ga go sekegiwa ga gagwe.

en: Mahumapelo is a Member of Parliament and is one of five other North West ANC members, including Premier Job Mokgoro, who are facing a DC in the province.
tsn: Mahumapelo ke tokololo ya Palamente e nil eke mongwe wa ba le batlhanomo Bokonebophirima ba maloko a ANC, go akaretsa Tonakgolo Job Mokgoro, ba ba lebanweng ke ditatofatso tsa bosenyi mo porofenseng.

en: Mokgoro has, however, indicated that he will not form part of todays meeting.
tsn: Mokgoro, le fa go ntse jalo, o kaile fa a sa tle go nna karolo ya kopano ya gompieno.

en: The Premier had his ANC membership suspended for allegedly going against the mandate of the ANC when voting for a new chair of chairs in the provincial legislature.
tsn: Botokololo jwa ANC jwa ga Tonakgolo bo emisitswe morago ga go sa lateleng taelo ya ANC la nako ya ditlhopho tsa modulasetilo yo mo ntšhwa wa ditulo tsa peomolaong mo porofenseng.

en: The KwaZulu-Natal government says it is accelerating its COVID-19 vaccination drive and that its on course to reach its target, having vaccinated more than 50 000 healthcare workers in both private and public hospitals.
tsn: Puso ya KwaZulu-Natal ya re e tlhotlheletsa letsholo la moento wa COVID-19 e bile seo se mo tseleng ya go fitlhelela maitlhomo a lona, go entilwe badiri ba lefapha la pholo ba feta 50 000 ba maokela a sephira le ba semmuso.

en: Premier Sihle Zikalala made the announcement in Durban on Sunday.
tsn: Tonakgolo Sihle Zikalala o dirile kitsiso kwa Durban ka Sontaga.

en: Zikalala is confident that by the end of Phase 2 of the vaccination programme at the end of September, the province would have vaccinated about three million people.
tsn: Zikalala o solofela gore mo legatong la bobedi la lenaneo la go entiwa fa kgwedi ya Lwetse e ya fifing, porofense e tshwanetse ya bo e entile batho ba lekana le didikadike/dimilone di le tharo.

en: KwaZulu-Natal has over 90 vaccination sites and more than 7 000 people who are trained to administer the shots
tsn: KwaZulu-Natal go na le mafelo a le masomearobongwe le batho ba feta dikete di le supa ba katiseditsweng go enta.

en: The province has identified mass vaccination centres in Pietermaritzburg and Durban
tsn: Porofense e supile mafelo a a magolo a moento mo Pietermaritzburg le kwa Durban.

en: Its target is to conduct 30 vaccinations per week.
tsn: Maikaelelo bona ke go dira meento e le masomeamararo ka beke.

en: The KwaZulu-Natal club gave the PSL until 10am to respond or face legal action and as things stand, it the league has now given in to the pressure.
tsn: Setlhopha sa KwaZulu-Natal se file PSL go fitlha ka 10am go araba kgotsa go lebagana le dikgato tsa semolao mme ka mokgwa o dilo di emeng ka ona, liki jaanong e ineetse ka mo tlase ga kgatelelo.

en: The league was quick to point on that the postponement was not an admission that Royal AM was correct in their interpretation of the Nyathi ruling.
tsn: Liki e nnile bonako go tlhagisa gore go busediwa morago e ne e se kamogelo ya gore Royal AM e ne e nepagetseng mo tlhalosong ya bona ya katlholo ya ga Nyathi.

en: The leagues legal representatives have now responded to the Royal AM, stating that there seems to be a dispute regarding the order by Judge Nyathi on Monday.
tsn: Baemedi ba semolao ba liki ga jaana ba arabile Royal AM mme ba tlhalosa gore go bonala go na le kganetsano e e mabapi le taelo ya  ga Moatlhodi Nyathi ka Mosupologo.

en: Our client adopts the former interpretation, and your client adopts the latter interpretation.
tsn: Modirelwa wa rona o amogela tlhaloso e e fetileng, fa modirelwa wa lona ena a amogela tlhaloso e e tlileng kwa morago.

en: The league has stated that it intends to apply to the High Court on an urgent basis for a declaratory order on the Judge Nyathi order and its suspension.
tsn: Liki e tlhalositse gore e ikaelela go dira kopo kwa kgotlatshekelong e e potlakileng gore go ntshiwe taelo ya motheo ya ga Moatlhodi Nyathi le kgapelothoko ya yona.

en: In order to resolve the dispute regarding the proper interpretation of the Nyathi J order, our client intends to apply today to the High Court on an urgent basis for an order declaring that section 18(1) applies so that the operation and execution of the Nyathi AJ order was suspended by its application for leave to appeal.
tsn: Gore go kgone go rarabololwa kgotlhang e e mabapi le tlhaloso e e lolameng ya ga Nyathi J, modirelwa wa rona o ikaeletse go dira kopo go kgotlatshekelo e e kwa godimo e e potlakileng ka ntlha ya taelo ya go bolela gore section 18 (1) e tswenngwe tirisong gore tiro le tiriso ya taelo ya ga Nyathi AJ e emisitswe ka kopo ya khunologo ya go ikuela.

en: In the alternative, our client will ask that the operation and execution of the Nyathi J order be suspended in terms of section 18(2).
tsn: Ka fa letlhakoreng le lengwe, modirelwa wa rona o tla kopa gore tiro le tiriso ya taelo ya ga Nyathi J e sekegiwe go ya ka section 18 (2).

en: The founding papers will be served on your client, via email to your offices as attorneys of record in the matter, as soon as possible during the course of the day.
tsn: Dipampiri di tlaa romelwa go modirelwa wa lona ka imeile kwa dikantorong tsa lona jaaka babueledi mo ntlheng e, ka bonako jo bo kgonegang, mo tsamaong ya letsatsi.

en: On Saturday, judgment was handed in the much-anticipated Glad  Africa Championship promotion case involving Sekhukhune United, Polokwane City and Royal AM, at the Johannesburg High Court.
tsn: Ka Lamatlhatso, katlholo e ne ya neelwa mo kgaisanong ya Glad Africa e e akaretsang Sekhukhune United, Polokwane City le Royal AM, kwa kgotlatshekelo e e kwa godimo kwa Johannesburg.

en: The counterclaim to review the arbitration award given by Epstein SC on 19 May 2021 is dismissed, read in part the High Court order.
tsn: Topotuelo ya go sekaseka tsereganyo e e neetsweng ke Epstein SC ka di 19 Motsheganong 2021 ga e a amogelwa, buisa go ya ka karolo ya taelo ya kgotlatshekelo e e kwa godimo.

en: Following that match, which they lost 1-0,Ba Bina Noko, as Sekhukhune United are affectionately known,lodged a complaint with the PSL DC, complaining that City had failed to include five Under-23 players on their team sheet, as per the PSL rules.
tsn: Ga latela motshameko o mo go ona ba tlhotsweng 1- 0, Ba Bina Noko, jaaka Sekhukhune United e itsege, ba tsentse ngongorego mo PSL DC, ba ngongoregela gore City e paletswe ke go akaretsa batshameki ba dingwaga tse di kwa tlase ga 23 ba le tlhano mo setlhopheng sa bona go ya ka melawana ya PSL.

en: While the PSL DC found Polokwane City guilty and deducted the three points they had irregularly secured against Sekhukhune, they decided not to award those point to the opposing team, as it had done so in similar previous cases.
tsn: Fa PSL DC e sena go bona Polokwane City molato le go gogela morago dintlha di le tharo tse ba neng ba di fitlhetse kgatlhanong le Sekhukhune, ba tsere tshwetso ya go se abele setlhopha se se ganetsang dintlha tseo, jaaka ba ne ba dirile mo mabakeng a a tshwanang a mo nakong e e fetileng.

en: This prompted Ba Bina Noko to lodge an appeal against the PSL DCs decision, the results of which was a decision by arbitration toward the three points and three goals to United, a few days before the final round of matches which would decide which team between Royal AM and United would gain straight promotion to the DSTV Premiership.
tsn: Se se dirile gore Ba Bina Noko ba tlhatlhele kgetse kgatlhanong le tshwetso ya PSL DC. Dipholo tse e neng e le tshwetso e e dirilweng ke botsereganyi kgatlhanong le dintlha di le tharo le dino di le tharo go United malatsi a le mmalwa pele ga karolo ya bofelo ya metshameko e e tla swetsang gore ke setlhopha sefe magareng ga Royal AM le United se se tla amogelang tlhatloso go ya kwa metshamekong ya DSTV.

en: However, the PSL Executive Committee, subsequently, challenged the decision by arbitration, refusing to award the points and the goals to Sekhukhune United.
tsn: Le fa go ntse jalo, Komiti khuduthamaga ya PSL, morago ga moo, e ne ya botsolotsa tshwetso ya katlholo, ya go gana go abela Sekhukhune United dintlha le dino.

en: The decision was to the benefit of Royal AM who went into their final match against Cape Town All-Stars at the top of the first division log.
tsn: Tshwetso e, e ne e tshwanetse go tswela Royal AM, e e tseneng mo motshamekong wa makgaola kgang kgatlhanong le Cape Town All-Stars mosola kwa godimo ga kgaolo ya ntlha.

en: They went on to win their final match after being awarded a much-talked-about soft penalty in the final stage of their decisive match even though the PSL didn’t hand the trophy and medal citing that they had been served with court papers.
tsn: Ba ne ba tswelela go fenya motshameko wa bona wa bofelo morago ga go newa penalethi e e boleta mo kgatong ya bofelo ya motshameko wa bona le mororo PSL e sa ba neela sekgele le mmentlele mme ba kaya fa se e le ka ntlha ya fa ba ne ba neetswe dipampiri tse di tswang kwa kgotlatshekelo.

en: Major tournament debutants North Macedonia are under no pressure to reach the Euro 2020 last 16 ahead of their pivotal Group C clash with Ukraine on Thursday, coach Igor Angelovski said.
tsn: Basimolodi ba bagolo ba thonamente, North Macedonia ga ba ka fa tlase ga kgatelelo epe ya go fitlhelela Euro 2020, ya ba le 16 ba bofelo pele ga thulano ya bona e e botlhokwa ya setlhopha sa C le Ukraine ka Labone, mokatisi Igor Angelovski o buile jalo.

en: Both teams are looking for their first wins after the Ukrainians conceded a late goal in a 3-2 defeat by the Netherlands while North Macedonia lost 3-1 to Austria.
tsn: Ditlhopha ka bobedi di lebeletse phenyo ya tsona ya ntlha morago ga fa setlhopha sa kwa Ukrain se sena go nosa nno mo motshamekong o mo go on ba fentsweng 3-2 ke Netherlands, fa North Macedonia e latlhegetswe 3-1 kgatlhanong le Austria.

en: It’s like a final for both sides
tsn: Okare ke motshameko wa bofelo mo matlhakoreng a mabedi

en: We too came here hoping to advance to the business end of the competition and we have to stay focused.
tsn: Le rona re ne re na le tsholofelo ya natlafatsa letlhakore la rona la kgwebo mme tshwanetse go nna re tlhomile mogopolo mo go seo.

en: We’re mixing it with Europe’s best teams.
tsn: Re e kopakopanya le ditlhopha tse di gaisang tsa kwa Europe.

en: Angelovski remained tight-lipped about possible changes to the starting line-up and formation.
tsn: Angelovski ga a a bua sepe ka ga diphetogo tse di ka diragalang kwa tshimolong le mo popegong ya setlhopha.

en: A thin bench does not give him too many options, although Ivan Trickovski could be preferred to Aleksandar Trajkovski up front.
tsn: Banka e e tshesane ga e mo fe ditshono di le dintsi thata, le mororo Ivan Trickovski e le ena a batliwang go gaisa Aleksandar Trajkovski kwa pele.

en: Defender Stefan Ristovski said team spirit was still high.
tsn: Mosireletsi Stefan Ristovski o rile mowa wa setlhopha o ne o santse o le kwa godimo.

en: We can’t let one defeat sink our mood and being in the Euros for the first time.
tsn: Re ka se letle go fenngwa gangwe fela go senye maikutlo a rona le go nna mo Euros lwa ntlha.

en: There isn’t much time for misery or celebrations whatever happens, he said.
tsn: Ga go na nako e ntsi ya kutlobotlhoko kgotsa ya keteko, le fa go ka diragala eng. a rialo.

en: We are heading into a tough game and well need to produce a top performance to stand any chance of winning.
tsn: Re lebagane le motshameko o o thata mme re tshwanetse go tlhagisa tiro e e kwa godimo gore re kgone go bona tšhono ya go fenya.

en: Defensively, two echelons will be required to thwart Ukraines attack.
tsn: Fa go tliwa mo tshireletsong, go tlaa tlhokega basireletsi ba le babedi go sireletsa kgatlhanong le setlhopha sa kwa Ukraines.

en: North Macedonia play the Netherlands in their final group match in Amsterdam on Monday while Ukrainetake on Austria in Bucharest.
tsn: North Macedonia e tlaa tshameka kgatlhanong le Netherlands mo setlhopheng sa bofelo kwa Amsterdam ka Mosupologo, fa Ukraine yona e tlaa tshameka kgatlhanong le Austria kwa Bucharest.

en: Ukraine not need extra motivation heading into Thursdays Euro 2020 Group C game with North Macedonia and are feeling positive despite narrowly losing their opening match against the Netherlands, head coach Andriy Shevchenko said on Wednesday.
tsn: Ukraine ga e kitla e tlhoka tlhotlheletso e e kwa godimo fa ba tsena mo motshamekong wa Euro 2020, setlhopha C le North Macedonia ka Labone, mme ba ikutlwa ba na le maikutlo a a siameng le fa ba ne ba latlhegetswe mo motshakong wa bona wa pulo kgatlhanong le go Netherlands, tlhogo ya bakatisi Andriy Shevchenko o buile jalo ka Laboraro.

en: Ukraine came back from 2-0 down against the Dutch on Sunday and looked set to earn a draw but a late goal by Denzel Dumfries left them empty-handed.
tsn: Ukraine e ikarabetse ka 2-0 go Dutch ka Sontaga mme ba ne ba lebega ba le malala a laotswe go iponela maleka, fela nno ya ga Denzel Dumfries e ba siile ba iphotlhere.

en: We have complete understanding within the team.
tsn: Re tlhaloganya setlhopha ka botlala.

en: We know the tasks we have ahead of us and additional words aren’t necessary.
tsn: Re a itse gore ke ditiro dife tse di re emetseng mme ga go botlhokwa gore re bue go feta foo.

en: The team is getting ready mentally, Shevchenko told reporters.
tsn: Batshameki ba setlhopha ba baakanya ditlhaloganyo tsa bona, Shevchenko o boleletse babegakgang.

en: This is a really important tournament.
tsn: Se ke thonamente e e botlhokwa thata.

en: Its not every year that we get to the group stage of the European Championship, so every player understands the importance of each match and has responsibility for their own game and the game of the team.
tsn: Ga e se ngwaga le ngwaga mo re fitlhang kwa maemong a setlhopha mo metshamekong ya makgaolakgang ya kwa Europe, ka jalo motshameki mongwe le mongwe o tlhaloganya botlhokwa jwa motshameko mongwe le mongwe mme o na le maikarabelo a motshameko  wa gagwe le motshameko wa setlhopha ka kakaretso.

en: So we don’t need any additional words.
tsn: Ka jalo ga re tlhoke mafoko go tlaleletsa.

en: North Macedonia were beaten 3-1 by Austria in their first match and sit bottom of the group standings below Ukraine.
tsn: North Macedonia e fentswe 3-1 ke Austria mo motshamekong wa bona wa ntlha mme ba dutse mo maemong a a kwa tlase ga Ukraine.

en: Shevchenko said the atmosphere in his team was good and they would not underestimate their opponents, who are playing their first major tournament as an independent nation.
tsn: Shevchenko o rile maikutlo mo setlhopheng sa gagwe a ne a le mantle mme ga ba kitla ba nyatsa ditlhopha tse di tlaa tshamekang kgatlhanong le ba bona, tse di tshamekang thonamente ya tsona ya ntlha jaaka naga e e ikemetseng.

en: We know we lacked just a little bit to achieve a positive result.
tsn: Re itse gore re tlhaetse go le gonnye fela gore re kgone fitlhelela dipholo tse di itumedisang.

en: The reaction from the team was great.
tsn: Tsibogo go tswa go setlhopha e ne e itumedisa.

en: We had many good moments and we are very positive about the game ahead, Shevchenko said.
tsn: Re nnile le nako e e itumedisang mme re na le tsholofelo mo motshamekong o o tlang, Shevchenko o buile jalo.

en: North Macedonia are a team that deserve respect.
tsn: North Macedonia ke setlhopha se se tshwanelwang ke tlotlo.

en: They have character, their own style of play and they counter-attack well.
tsn: Ba na le botho, mokgwa wa bona wa go tshameka mme ba tlhasela sentle.

en: During the last couple of years, they have had several good games where they have beaten top teams.
tsn: Mo dingwageng di le dintsi tse di fetileng, ba nnile le metshameko e e siameng, e mo go yona ba fentseng ditlhopha tse di kwa godimo.

en: So we have to be really careful of their counter-attacks.
tsn: Ka jalo re tshwanetse go nna kelotlhoko thata ka tlhaselo ya bona.

en: Turkey coach Senol Gunes blamed their poor start to Euro 2020 on a flurry of individual mistakes after a 2-0 defeat to Wales on Wednesday left them without a point after two games.
tsn: Mokatisi wa Turkey Senol Gunes o supile batshameki ba ba rileng ka monwana ka ntlha ya diphoso tse ba di dirileng kwa tshimologong ya Euro 2020, morago ga gore phenyo ya Wales ya 2-0 ka Laboraro e ba sie ba sena ntlha morago ga metshameko e mebedi.

en: After losing 3-0 to Italy in their opening Group A game, Turkey fell to their second consecutive defeat after Aaron Ramsey and Connor Roberts scored for Wales at Bakus Olympic Stadium.
tsn: Morago ga go latlhegelwa 3-0 go Italy mo motshamekong wa setlhopha sa A, Turkey e wetse tlase morago ga gore Aaron Ramsey le Connor Roberts ba nosetse Wales kwa lebaleng la metshameko la Bakus.

en: I don’t think we ever got over the shock of the first game (against Italy), said Gunes.
tsn: Ga ke akanye gore re amogetseng letshogo le re nnileng le lona ka motshameko wa ntlha (kgatlhanong le Italy), Gunes a rialo.

en: Especially for the first half an hour, I think we were stuck in the previous game.
tsn: Segolo bogolo ka halofo ya ura ya ntlha, ke akanya gore re ne re santse re akantse motshameko o fetileng.

en: Despite that, we made a good start to the second half and dominated for a while, until we started making individual mistakes again, the veteran coach said.
tsn: Le fa go le jalo, re dirile tshimologo e e siameng mo halofong ya bobedi mme motshameko o ne wa laolwa ke rona nakwana, go fitlha re simolola go dira diphoso gape, mokatisi yo o nang le maitemogelo o buile jalo.

en: Turkey, who face Switzerland in their final group match on Sunday, have conceded five goals in their first two games of the tournament and scored none.
tsn: Turkey, e e tla lebaganang le  Switzerland mo motshamekong wa bona wa bofelo wa setlhopha,ba lekile go nosa dino di le tlhano mo metshamekong ya bona e mebedi ya ntlha ya thonamente mme ba feleleditse ba sa nosa le fa e nngwe ya dino tseo.

en: I don’t remember us making so many errors in passing, ever.
tsn: Ga ke gakologelwe re dira diphoso tse dintsi jaana mo go fetiseng kgwele, le eseng.

en: When you lose the ball so easily, and have such a difficulty in getting it back, no wonder you’ll struggle, Gunes added.
tsn: Fa o latlhegelwa ke kgwele bonolo jalo, mme o na le bothata jwa go e busetsa gape kwa go wena, ga go gakgamatse gore o tlaa nna le bothata. Gunes a tlaleletsa.

en: Asked whether his tactics played a role in the two losses, Gunes said: You can add the inexperience to the mix, the lack of physical power, and the will to fight one on one with each player.
tsn: Fa a bodiwa gore a maano a gagwe a nnile le seabe mo ditatlhegelong tse pedi  tse, Gunes o rile: “O ka tsenya go tlhoka maitemogelo mo kgannyeng e, tlhaelo ya maatla a mmele, le kitso ya go lwantsha batshameki ka bongwe ka bongwe”.

en: At the end of the day, I am observing a weight on the shoulders of the team and we failed to boost their confidence to take it off of them.
tsn: Kwa bokhutlong jwa letsatsi, ke etse tlhoko morwalo o o relweng ke setlhopha mo magetleng a bona, mme re paletswe ke go tiisa nonofo ya bona ka boikanyego gore re kgone go ba rola morwalo o.

en: I take full responsibility.
tsn: Ke tsaya maikarabelo ka botlalo.

en: They are all good players, but we expected more from them.
tsn: Botlhe ke batshameki ba ba siameng, mme re ne re solofetse go le gontsi go tswa mo go bona.

en: It’s not right to blame the players.
tsn: Ga go siama gore re tshwaye batshemeki diphoso.

en: Italy lead Group A with six points after two rounds of matches and are ahead of Wales(four), Switzerland(one)and Turkey(zero).
tsn: Italy e eteletse pele Setlhopha sa A ka dintlha di le thataro morago ga metshameko e mebedi mme ba eteletse kwa pele Wales (nne), Switzerland (nngwe) le Turkey (lefela).

en: They can seal top spot with a draw in their final pool game against Wales on Sunday.
tsn: Ba ka iponela maemo a a kwa godimo go feta ka go tshameka maleka mo motshamekong wa bona wa bofelo kgatlhanong le Wales ka Sontaga.

en: Italy become the first team to reach the Round of 16.
tsn: Italy ke yona setlhopha sa ntlha go fitlhelela kwa karolong ya 16.

en: Wales scored right at the death in injury time when a corner was played short and Connor Roberts was on hand to divert a Bale pass past goalkeeper Ugurcan Cakir to seal the victory.
tsn: Wales e nositse ka nako ya dikgobalo fa go ne go tshamekiwa huku mme Connor Robert o ne a le malala a laotswe go faposa kgwele e o gore e fete motshwaradino e leng Ugurcan Cakir go bona phenyo.

en: Switzerland coach Vladimir Petkovic has told his players not to show in-form Italy too much respect and have belief that they can win when the teams meet in a European Championship Group A clash in Rome on Wednesday.
tsn: Mokatisi wa Switzerland Vladimir Petkovic o boleletse batshameki ba gagwe gore ba se ka ba bontsha Italy tlotla e e feteletseng mme ba nne le tumelo ya gore ba ka kgona go fenya fa ditlhopha tse di kopana mo thulanong ya dikgaisano tsa makgaolakgang tsa kwa Europe kwa Rome ka Laboraro.

en: Italy brushed aside Turkey 3-0 in their tournament opener with a slick display that continued their fine form of going unbeaten in their last 28 games dating back to September 2018.
tsn: Italy e kgapetse kwa thoko Turkey 3-0 mo kgaisanong ya ga go bula mo metshamekong ya bona ya bofelo e le 28 go tloga ka Lwetse 2018.

en: We will do what we have always done, which is to play our own game, Petkovic told reporters on Tuesday.
tsn: Re tla dira se re tlwaetseng go se dira, e leng go tshameka motshameko wa rona, Petkovic o boleletse babegadikgang ka Labobedi.

en: We will respect Italy, but not too much.
tsn: Re tla tlotla Italy, fela e seng go feta selekanyo.

en: They are the big favourites, not only in our group, but in general in this tournament.
tsn: Ke bommamoratwa ba bagolo, e seng fela mo setlhopheng sa rona, mme mo kgaisanong eno ka kakaretso.

en: We all saw the quality they showed against Turkey.
tsn: Rotlhe re bone boleng jo ba bo bontshitse kgatlhanong le Turkey.

en: But we have quality too and can surprise them.
tsn: Mme le rona le na le boleng e bile re ka ba gakgamatsa.

en: We will try to turn the game in our favour and be a bit quicker when we attack and create chances.
tsn: Re tla leka go fetola motshameko gore o direle rona mme re nne bonako go tlhasela le go tlhama tšhono.

en: Switzerland have matched Belgium, Brazil, England and Spain in recent years, which Petkovic says should give them cause for optimism.
tsn: Switzerland e tshamekile kgatlhanong le Belgium, Brazil, England le Spain mo dingwageng tse di fetileng, se Petkovic a reng se tshwanetse go ba naya lebaka le le isegang.

en: I hope that we will give 120%, just like we did against all the other big teams.
tsn: Ke solofela gore re tla bontsha 120%, fela jaaka re dirile kgatlhanong le ditlhopha tse dingwe tse dikgolo.

en: We will need to be better than we actually are.
tsn: Re tla tlhoka go nna botoka go feta ka mokgwa o re leng ka teng.

en: We will have to have a great effort, run a lot and be great in duels.
tsn: Re tla tshwanelwa ke go nna le maikaelelo a magolo, re taboge thata mme re nne batshameki ba ba siameng.

en: Then we can win, he said.
tsn: Ka jalo re ka fenya, o ne a bolela jalo.

en: We need to play our own game and be dangerous in the final third.
tsn: Re tlhoka go tshameka motshameko wa rona le go nna kotsi mo karolong ya bofelo ya boraro.

en: We must guard against certain Italian moves, but also be true to ourselves.
tsn: Re tshwanetse go ela tlhoko maItaly  a a rileng, mme gape re nne le nnete mo go rona.

en: Let’s take things one match at a time, we will not get ahead of ourselves, he added.
tsn: Tla re tseye dilo ka bongwe ka bongwe ka nako, ga re kitla re iketelela kwa pele, a tlaleletsa.

en: It is very important to give 120% with the best starting XI available.
tsn: Go botlhokwa thata go naya 120%, ka tshimologo e e ntle ya XI e e leng teng.

en: We hope we can produce a big performance and win the match to be sure that we can go through to the next round.
tsn: Re solofela gore re tla tlhagisa tiragalo e kgolo le go fenya kgaisano e go netefatsa gore re ka kgona go ya kwa legatong le le latelang.

en: Italy coach Roberto Mancini said his excellent team can only improve ahead of their second European Championship match, against Switzerland, even though they made a near perfect start in their opening clash with Turkey last week.
tsn: Mokatisi wa Italy Roberto Mancini a re setlhopha sa gagwe se tlaa  tokafala fela pele ga motshameko wa kgaisano wa bobedi kgatlhanong le Switzerland, le fa ba dirile tshimologo e e batlileng e le botoka thata mo thulanong ya bona ya pulo le Turkey mo bekeng e e fetileng.

en: The Turkey game was difficult, Mancini told a news conference.
tsn: Motshameko wa Turkey o ne o le boima thata, Mancini o boleletse khonferense ya dikgang.

en: But when we scored, they opened up.
tsn: Mme e rile fa sena go nosa, ba lokologa.

en: We will have to win the next one and if possible also the next one.
tsn: Re tla tshwanelwa ke go fenya e e latelang mme fa go kgonega, re fenye e nngwe gape e e latelang.

en: We have to do our best.
tsn: Re tshwanetse go dira bojotlhe jwa rona.

en: I am confident.
tsn: Ke na le tsholofelo.

en: This is an excellent team that can only improve.
tsn: Se, ke setlhopha se se gaisang se se ka tokafalang..

en: If the English bookmakers say (Italy are favourites), we accept it because they get it right, but the championship is still long.
tsn: Fa batsayadibetšhe ba maasemane ba ka re (Italy ke yona mmamoratwa), re a amogela ka gore ba dira sentle, mme fela mo kgaisano e sa ntse e le telele.

en: We have much work to do.
tsn: Re na le tiro e ntsi e re tshwanetseng go e dira.

en: Victory over Switzerland will see Italy become the first team to reach the knockout stages of Euro 2020, with one Group A match still to play.
tsn: Phenyo ya Switzerland e tlaa dira gore Italy e nne yona setlhopha sa ntlha go fitlhelela dikgato tsa peletsontle tsa EURO 2020, ka motshameko o le mongwe wa setlhopha sa A o santse o tlile go tshameka.

en: However, the Italians have won their opening two matches only twice in their nine previous appearances at the European Championship, doing so in 2000 and 2016, and Mancini is not taking Switzerland lightly.
tsn: Le fa go ntse jalo, Italy e fentse metshameko e mebedi ya pulo gabedi fela mo dikgaisanong tsa makgaolakgang tswa kwa Europe di le robonngwe tse di fetileng, ba dirile jalo ka 2000 le 2016, mme Mancini ga a tseye Switzerland botlhofo.

en: They are always among the top rankings in world football, with good and experienced players, and they have a coach who knows Italy very well having coached here previously.
tsn: Ba ka gale mo setlhopheng sa kgwele ya dinao ya maemo a a kwa godimo mo lefatsheng, ba na le batshameki ba ba nang le bokgoni, mme gape ba na le mokatisi yo o itseng Italy sentle ka ntlha ya fa a e katisitse mo nakong e e fetileng.

en: It will be difficult, and we will need to be at our top level.
tsn: Go ka nna bokete, mme re tlaa tlhoka go nna mo maemong a a kwa godimo.

en: Italy defender Leonardo Bonucci praised the togetherness of the group, highlighting team spirit as one reason for their resurgence since failing to qualify for the 2018 World Cup.
tsn: Mosireletsi wa Italy Leonardo Bonucci o akgola setlhopha ka tshwaragano ya sona, mme o tlhalosa fa maikutlo a bona e le lengwe la mabaka a a dirileng gore ba nne le maatla gape fa e sale ba palelwa ke go atlega ka metshameko ya Sejana sa Lefatshe ya 2018.

en: Three years ago was a real low point for us, he said.
tsn: Dingwaga di le tharo tse di fetileng di ne di sa itumedise mo go rona, a rialo.

en: Humility and keeping your feet on the ground are the secrets to competing like we did against Turkey.
tsn: Boikobo le go dira ka natla ke diphiri tse di re kgontshitseng go tshameka ka tsela e re tshamekileng ka yona kgatlhanong le Turkey.

en: We have always reset after great wins, continuing to do our duty.
tsn: Re tlwaetse go ikgakologelwa morago ga diphenyo tse di ntle,mme re tswelela go dira tiro ya rona.

en: The desire to return to the national team is back.
tsn: Keletso ya go boela kwa setlhopheng sa naga e boile.

en: It is thanks to the coach, we came from a dark place.
tsn: Ke leboga Mokatisi. Re ne re le mo lefifing.

en: The fact we are improving is a natural consequence of the good feeling among us.
tsn: Go dira sentle ga rona ke ditlamorago tsa maikutlo a a siameng mo gare ga rona.

en: Limpopo DSTV Premiership outfit, Tshakhuma Tsha Madzivhandila Football Club, will have a new name and logo ahead of the new season.
tsn: Moaparo wa dikgaisano tsa DSTV kwa Limpopo, setlhopha sa kgwele ya dinao sa Tshakhuma Tsha Madzivhandila, se tlaa nna le leina le letshwaomoono le lešwa pele ga setlha se se latelang.

en: The Polokwane-based club will unveil the new name and logo at an event in Sandton, Johannesburg, on Thursday.
tsn: Setlhopha se sa kwa Polokwane se tlaa sirolola leina le letshwaomoono la sona  kwa moletlong kwa Sandton, Johannesburg, ka Labone.

en: One of the names being bandied about is Marumo Gallants FC.
tsn: Lengwe la maina a go neng go buiwa ka ona ke Marumo Gallants FC.

en: The Nedbank champions were bought by Abraham Sello from the club’s previous owner, Lawrence Mulaudzi, following financial problems earlier this year.
tsn: Dikgaisano tsa Nedbank di ne di rekilwe ke Abraham Sello go tswa go mong wa setlhopha wa pele, Lawrence Mulaudzi, go latela mathata a matlole mo tshimologong ya ngwaga ono.

en: The current club’s chairman, Abraham Sello, opted to rebrand the club by changing the name and the logo.
tsn: Modulasetulo wa ga jaana wa setlhopha, Abraham Sello,o itlhophetse go ntšhwafatsa setlhopha ka go fetola leina le letshwaomoono.

en: The Club’s spokesperson, Rufus Matsena, says the clubs main sponsor will also be unveiled on Thursday.
tsn: Sebueledi sa setlhopha, Rufus Matsena, a re moetleetsi yo mogolo le ena o tlaa rebolwa ka Labone.

en: We are actually getting rid of the old name which is Tshakhuma Tsha Madzivhandila which is famous as TTM.
tsn: Re tota go batla go tlosa leina la bogologolo e leng Tshakhuma Tsha Madzivhandila e e itsegeng jaaka TTM.

en: We are definitely unveiling the new name and the logo.
tsn: Re tile go sirolola leina le letshwaomoono le lešwa.

en: We do have a technical sponsor that is being negotiated, says Matsena.
tsn: Re na le ketleetso ya setegeniki e e santseng e rerisanelwa, go bua Matsena.

en: TTM’s bank account has meanwhile been frozen after Mulaudzi demanded to be paid R10 million, which was reportedly outstanding when the club was sold.
tsn: Akhaonto ya banka ya TTM e santse e emisitswe nakwana morago ga gore Mulaudzi a batle go duelwa madi a kana ka dimilione di le R10, a go kaiwang a ne a saletse kwa morago fa setlhopha se ne se rekisiwa.

en: Matsena, however, says the matter is being handled by their lawyers.
tsn: Matsena, le fa go ntse jalo, a re ntlha e tshwerwe ke babueledi ba bona.

en: The issue pertaining to the previous chairman and the chairman is something that we cannot be discussing at the moment because is sub-judicare the matter is handled by the lawyers lets leave it like that until such time we get a go ahead from both parties, especially their legal representative.
tsn: Ntlha e e amanang le modulasetulo wa mo nakong e e fetileng le modulasetulo, ke sengwe se re ka se kgone go bua ka sona mo nakong eno ka gonne ke kgang ya semolao e tsamaisiwang ke babueledi. Tla re e tlogeleng go fitlhela re newa tetla ke makoko ka bobedi, segolobogolo moemedi wa bona wa semolao.

en: Mulaudzi had bought the then Bidvest Wits club last year.
tsn: Mulaudzi o ne a rekile setlhopha se se neng se bidiwa Bidvest Wits ka nako eo mo ngwageng o o fetileng.

en: He sold it to Sello within five months due to financial challenges.
tsn: O se rekiseditse Sello mo dikgweding di le tlhano ka ntlha ya dikgwetlho tsa matlole.

en: TheRussians, who remain unbeaten against the Finns since their first meeting in 1912, made amends for their opening loss to Belgium as the group remains wide open.
tsn: MaRashia, ba ba dulang ba fenya kgatlhanong le Finns fa e sale ba kopana ka 1912, ba dirile ditlhabololo morago ga go latlhegelwa kgatlhanong le Belgium jaaka setlhopha se setse se bulegile

en: An injury to Mario Fernandes after a rough fall in the 26th minute did not shift Russia’s focus and his replacement Vyacheslav Karavaev almost tapped in a cutback at the far post minutes after coming on.
tsn: Kgobalo ya ga Mario Fernandes morago ga go wa botlhoko ka motsotso wa bo 24 ga e a ama makemisetso a Russia mme motho yo o neng a tsenngwa mo boemong jwa gagwe Vyacheslav Karavaev o batlile go kgaolwa metsotso morago ga go tsena ga gagwe.

en: Belgium, who beat Russia3-0 in their opener, top the group ahead of their game against Denmark on Thursday.
tsn: Belgium, e e iteileng Russia 3-0 ka motshameko wa bona wa pulo, ba ne ba le mo maemong a a kwa godimo pele ga motshameko wa bona kgatlhanong le Denmark ka Labone.

en: Thousands of Turkish fans are expected to travel to the Azerbaijan capital for the game and are likely to create a partisan atmosphere for what is a must-win game for Senol Guness Turkey side at the Olympic Stadium.
tsn: Diketekete tsa batshegetsi ba kwa Turkey ba solofetswe go ya kwa khepetleleng ya Azerbaijan go ya go bogela motshameko e bile go na le kgonagalo ya gore ba tlaa tlhola mowa o o monate wa phenyo kwa motshamekong wa Senol Guness Turkey kwa lebaleng la Olimpiki.

en: When I’ve played in Turkey before, the atmosphere has been incredible, Bale told a news conference on Tuesday.
tsn: Fa ke ne ke tshamekela kwa Turkey mo nakong e e fetileng, mowa wa teng o ne o le monate, Bale o boleletse ba dikgang kwa khonferenseng ka Labobedi.

en: Of course, they will be cheering on the Turkish team but you need crowds in these tournaments.
tsn: Ee, ba tlaa be ba rotloetsa setlhopha sa kwa Turkey mme o tlhoka matshwititshwiti a batho mo dikgaisano tseo.

en: No problem with(hostility).
tsn: Ga go na lathata ka (kilano).

en: Were used to playing away games in front of hostile crowds.
tsn: Re ne re tlhola re tshameka metshameko ya kwa ntle ga legae mo pele ga matshwititshwiti a a tletseng kilano a.

en: This is what we do for a living.
tsn: Se ke se re se dirang go itshedisa.

en: If anything it should spur us on to be a bit more ruthless on the pitch.
tsn: Fa e le sengwe, se se tshwanetse go re rotloetsa go dira tiro e tletse boswele mo lebaleng.

en: Hopefully we can keep them silent.
tsn: Re solofela gore re tla kgona go ba didimatsa.

en: Rob Page’s Wales were restricted to 38% ball possession against Switzerland, with striker Kieffer Moore scoring from one of their two attempts on target as they came from behind to snatch a crucial point.
