tsn: Wales ya ga Rob Page e kgonne go tshwara fela 38% ya kgwele mo motshamekong kgatlhanong le Switzerland, fa motshamekapele Kieffer Moore a ne a nosa go tswa mo go nngwe ya maiteko a bona a  mabedi, fa ba ne ba tlhaga kwa morago go iponela ntlha ya botlhokwa.

en: Although he would not label the match against the Turks as a must-win, Page believes three points should put them in the driving seat for qualification to the knockout stages.
tsn: Le fa a se kitla a bitsa motshameko kgatlhanong le Turks jaaka motshameko o o tshwanetsweng ke phenyo, Page o dumela gore dintlha di le tharo di tshwanetse go ba baya kwa pele gore ba kgone go tsenela dikarolo tsa peletsontle.

en: He is expecting another tight contest against Turkey who arrived at the Euros with victories over Netherlands and Norway in World Cup qualifiers but slumped to a 3-0 defeat by Italy in the opening match of the tournament.
tsn: O solofetse kgaisano e nngwe e e tsepameng kgatlhanong le Turkey, e e gorogileng kwa Euros morago ga phenyo ya yona kgatlhanong le Netherlands le Norway kwa metshamekong ya Sejana sa Lefatshe sa mme ba fenngwa 3-0 ke Italy kwa kgaisanong ya pulo ya semmuso ya metshameko.

en: They had a very difficult opener and will be looking at us to get the full three points.
tsn: Ba nnile le pulo e e bokete mme ba lebile mo go rona gore re bone dintlha di le tharo ka botlalo.

en: Were fully prepared for a tough game, Page said.
tsn: Re ipaakanyeditse motshameko o o bokete o ka botlalo, Page o buile jalo.

en: We’ve also identified this game as the one we can do alright in.
tsn: Gape re supile motshameko o jaaka motshameko o re ka dirang sentle thata mo go ona.

en: It’s about finding a way to win.
tsn: Ke ka ga go bona tsela ya go fenya.

en: If we can get four points from two games, then it sets us up nicely.
tsn: Fa re ka bona dintlha di le nne go tswa mo metshamekong e mebedi, re tlaa bo re le maemong a a siameng thata.

en: Turkey coach Senol Gunes and captain Burak Yilmaz said the team would bounce back against Wales on Wednesday after a disappointing 3-0 loss to Italy in their first match of the European Championship.
tsn: Mokatisi wa Turkey Senol Gunes le mokapotene Burak Yilmaz ba re setlhopha se tlaa boela kwa maemong a sona kgatlhanong le Wales ka Laboraro morago ga tatlhegelo e e swabisang ya 3-0 kgatlhanong le Italy mo motshamekong wa bona wa kgaisono ya ntlha ya kwa Europe.

en: We had two devastating days after the Italy game, Yilmaz told a press conference on Tuesday ahead of their second Group A match at Bakus Olympic Stadium.
tsn: Re nnile le matsatsi a mabedi a a utlwisang botlhoko morago ga motshameko, wa Italy, Yilmaz o boleletse khonferense ya bobegakgang ka Labobedi pele ga motshameko wa bona wa setlhopha sa bobedi kwa lebaleng la metshameko la Bakus Olympic.

en: His team are hoping that the presence of many of their fans in Azerbaijan, which has close ethnic and cultural ties with Turkey, will help earn them three sorely needed points.
tsn: Setlhopha sa gagwe se solofetse gore go nna teng ga balatedi ba bona ba bantsi mo Azerbaijan, ba ba nang le kgolagano ya semorafe le ya setso le Turkey, go tla thusa go bona dintlha di le tharo tse di tlhokegang.

en: Our fans are always with us.
tsn: Balatedi ba rona ba dula ba na le rona ka dinako tsotlhe.

en: With their support and unity in the team, we are back on our feet now and focused on our goals, he said.
tsn: Ka tshegetso le tshwaragano ya bona mo setlhopheng, re boetse mannong jaanong mme re tlhomile mogopolo wa rona mo maikaelelong a rona, o buile jalo.

en: We have a very difficult game tomorrow.
tsn: Re na le motshameko o o boima thata kamoso.

en: We are aware of our mistakes in the first game, and we had realistic meetings.
tsn: Re lemogile diphoso tsa rona mo motshamekong wa ntlha, e bile re nnile le dikopano.

en: I believe we will be what is expected of us tomorrow.
tsn: Ke dumela gore re tla re le se se solofetsweng kamoso.

en: Gunes has plenty to ponder after a meek performance in the Italy match, when Turkey failed to make any real impact.
tsn: Gunes o na le dilo tse di ntsi tse a tshwanetseng go akanya ka tsona morago ga motshameko o o bokoa kgatlhanong le Italy, fa Turkey e ne e retelelwa ke go dira tiro e e bonalang.

en: He echoed Yilmaz’s remarks about the need to take an honest look in the mirror.
tsn: O dumalane le ditshwaelo tsa ga Yilmaz ka ga tlhokego ya go iteba mo seiponeng.

en: Bad game, bad outcome.
tsn: Motshameko o o seng montle, dipholo tse di seng di ntle.

en: We are not finding excuses for our bad performance
tsn: Ga re leke go dira maipato ka tiro ya rona e e sa kgatlhiseng.

en: Now we have to stop being sorry and get to work, Gunes said.
tsn: Jaanong re tshwanetse go emisa go itshwabela mme re simolole go dira, Gunes o buile jalo.

en: We know the weaknesses of our game, and we have to play with a new approach tomorrow.
tsn: Re itse makoa a motshameko wa rona, mme re tshwanetse go tshameka ka mokgwa o mošwa kamoso.

en: Wales are a strong team and they played the semis in the last tournament.
tsn: Wales ke setlhopha se se tiileng mme ba tshamekile motshameko wa bofelo mo kgaisanong  e e fetileng.

en: We have a different approach and a different philosophy from them.
tsn: Re na le tsela e e farologaneng ya go dira dilo go tswa mo go tsona.

en: We can get 4 or 6 points from the next 2 games, but the aim is to get to the knockout stage, he added.
tsn: Re ka fitlhelela dintlha di le 4 kgotsa di le 6 go tswa mo metshamekong e mebedi (2) e e latelang, mme maikaelelo a rona ke go tsenela karolo ya peletsontle, a tlaleletsa.

en: Gunes said he may make a couple of changes to the team that played Italy.
tsn: Gunes o rile a ka dira diphetogo di le mmalwa mo setlhopheng se se tshamekileng kgatlhanong le Italy.

en: I have trust in everyone in the squad, he said.
tsn: Ke na le tshepo mo go mongwe le mongwe mo setlhopheng, a rialo.

en: He said Wales had shown a defensive approach, which the Turkish squad had analysed.
tsn: O rile Wales e bontshitse mokgwa wa phemelo, o o sekasekilweng ke setlhopha sa kwa Turkey.

en: For tomorrow’s game we are not thinking about if it will be three or four players (in defence).
tsn: Mo motshamekong wa kamoso ga re akanye gore a e ka nna batshameki ba le bararo kgotsa ba le bane (go sireletsa).

en: I prefer they’d play without a defence, Yilmaz joked.
tsn: Ke eletsa ekete ba ka tshameka kwa ntle ga tshireletso, Yilmaz a dira motlae.

en: Each night of the swim-offs to determine who will represent Australia in Tokyo next month has thrown up a new star but the penultimate day was very much reserved for the old guard, and the country’s long-standing queen of the pool.
tsn: Bosigo bongwe le bongwe jwa dikgaisano tsa go thuma tse di tlhomamisang gore ke mang yo o tla emelang Australia kwa Tokyo mo kgweding e e tlang, bo tlhagisitse naledi e ntšhwa mme letsatsi pele ga leo le ne le beetswe kwa thoko go dirisiwa ke kgosigadi ya bogologolo ya lekadiba mo nageng.

en: Sprinter Cate Campbell, 29, clinched the second qualifying spot in an extraordinary last race of the night in which four women dipped under 53 seconds in the 100m freestyle, making the Australian 4x 100m freestyle relay team hot gold medal favourites in Tokyo.
tsn: Mothumi Cate Campbell, 29, o iponetse maemo a bobedi mo kgaisanong e e kgethegileng ya bofelo ya lobelo lwa bosigo e mo go yona basadi ba le bane ba thumileng 100m ka metsotswana e le 53, mme a dira gore setlhopha sa ba le bane ba kwa Australia e nne sona bommamoratwa ba mentlele wa gauta kwa Tokyo.

en: Emma McKeon, 27, who won more medals (four) than any other Australian swimmer in Rio, came home first in 52.35 seconds at the South Australia Aquatic Centre with Campbell clocking 52.59.
tsn: Emma Mckeon, 27, yo o ikgapetseng dimmentlele (nne) tse di fetang tsa bathumi botlhe kwa Rio, e nnile ena wa ntlha go fitlha kwa gae mo motsotswaneng e le 52.35 kwa senthareng ya Aquatic kwa borwa jwa Australia fa Campbell ena a fitlheletse 52.59.

en: This has been the most nerve racking week of my life.
tsn: Se e nnile beke e e boima thata mo botshelong jwa me.

en: What a week it has been in the swimming pool.
tsn: A beke e ke nnileng le yona mo lekadibeng.

en: It is such an exciting team to be a part of.
tsn: Ke setlhopha se se itumedisang thata go nna karolo ya sona.

en: To be going to my fourth Olympics is something I am incredibly proud to say I have achieved, Campbell said.
tsn: Gore ke be ke ya kwa diolimpiking lwa bone ke sengwe se ke motlotlo thata gore ke be ke se fitlheletse, Campbell o ne a bolela jalo.

en: We have just had four girls break 53 seconds; I mean what is going on?
tsn: Re fetsa go nna le basetsana ba le bane ba ba robileng rekoto ya metsotswana e le 53; ke raya gore go diragala eng?

en: The depth of talent in this event is just incredible.
tsn: Boteng jwa talente mo tiragalong eno ke jo bo gakgamatsang.

en: Local favourite Madison Wilson finished third with Meg Harris fourth.
tsn: Mmamoratwa wa selegae Madison Wilson o feditse mo logatong lwa boraro fa Meg Harris ena a feditse mo logatong lwa bone.

en: The first final of the night was an event that has been dominated globally by one man, the now retired American Michael Phelps who has struck gold in the 200m individual medley in each of the last four Olympics.
tsn: Logato lwa ntlha mo bosigong jono e ne e le tiragalo e e neng e itlhomile kwa pele lefatshe ka bophara ka ntlha ya monna a le nosi, Michael Phelps wa kwa Amerika yo ga jaana a rotseng tiro, yo o fitlheletseng gauta mo 200m ka nosi mo go nngwe le nngwe ya diolimpiki di le nne tse di fetileng.

en: Mitch Larkin, who took silver in the 200m backstroke in Rio, has chosen to focus on the medley as his best chance of gold next month and romped home first in 1:56.29, well clear of Brendon Smith in second.
tsn: Mitch Larkin, yo o neng a tsaya selefera mo 200m ya go thuma ka mokwatla kwa Rio, o tlhophile go tlhoma mogopolo mo medley jaaka tšhono e e gaisang ya gauta mo kgweding e e tlang mme e nnile ena wa ntlha wa goroga kwa gae ka 1: 56.29, fa Brendon Smith ena a tsere logato lwa bobedi.

en: I feel really good, tonight was just a matter of digging deep, Larkin said.
tsn: Ke ikutlwa ke itumetse thata, gompieno e ne e le kgang fela ya go leba kwa botennyeng, Larkin o buile jalo.

en: Physically I’m in the best shape I’ve ever been.
tsn: Mo mmeleng, ke itekanetse go feta mo nakong e e fetileng.

en: The decision to drop the 200m backstroke in Tokyo had not been easy.
tsn: Tshwetso ya go tlogela go thuma 200m ka mokwatla kwa Tokyo e ne e se botlhofo.

en: It was really difficult deciding between the two events and we sat down and looked at what would make the final and medals and then gold medal, he said.
tsn: Go ne go le boima thata go tlhopha magareng ga ditiragalo tse pedi tse mme re ile ra nna fa fatshe ra lebelela gore ke efe e e tla re fitlhisang kwa bokhutlong, dimmentlele le mmetlele wa gauta, a rialo.

en: Jenna Strauch (24), will compete in her maiden Olympics after winning the women’s 200m breaststroke and will be joined by Abbey Harkin (23), also making her Games debut.
tsn: Jenna Strauch (24), o tlaa tsenela diolimpiki morago ga go fenya kgaisano ya basadi ya go thuma ka sehuba ya 200m mme o tla be a na le Abbey Harkin (23), yo o tla bong a ikitsise kwa metshamekong.

en: The men’s 200m backstroke final was won by Tristan Hollard (24), who was close to tears afterwards as he secured a spot at his first ever Olympics.
tsn: Kgaisano ya banna ya makgaolakgang ya go thuma 200m ka mokwatla, e ikgapetswe ke Tristan Hollard (24), yo o neng a le gaufi le dikeledi morago ga go iponela lefelo kwa diolimpiking tsa gagwe tsa ntlha.

en: Belgium defender Timothy Castagne has undergone surgery on a double fracture of his eye socket suffered in the European Championship at the weekend, officials confirmed on Wednesday.
tsn: Mosireletsi wa ka Belgium Timothy Castagne o dirile karo morago ga gore sokete ya leitlho la gagwe e gobale kwa dikgaisanong tsa kwa Europe mo mafelong a beke, batlhankedi ba netefaditse se ka Laboraro.

en: The fullback was injured in a heavy collision with Russian Daler Kuzyaev in the first half of Saturdays 3-0 Group B win in St Petersburg, fracturing the eye socket below and to the right of his right eye.
tsn: O ile a gobala mo thulanong e e bokete le Daler Kuzyaev mo seripeng sa ntlha sa phenyo ya 3-0 ya setlhopha sa B kwa St Petersburg, mo a gobaditseng sokete ya ka fa tlase ga leitlho go ela kwa mojeng wa leitlho teng.

en: He was immediately substituted and within hours had been ruled out of the tournament by coach Robert Martinez, though he has told team mates he wants to be back for the closing stages if Belgium progress that far.
tsn: Go ne ga tsenngwa motshameki yo mongwe mo boemong jwa gagwe mme morago ga diura di se kae, a phimolwa mo kgaisanong eno ke mokatisi Robert Martinez, le fa a boleletse batshameki mmogo le ena gore o batla go nna teng ka dikgato tsa bofelo fa e le gore Belgium e tlaa fitlhelela koo.

en: Castagne underwent the operation on Tuesday.
tsn: Castagne o tswa go dira karo ka Labobedi.

en: Dennis Praet, his Belgium and Leicester City team mate, told reporters.
tsn: Dennis Praet, motshameki mmogo le ena kwa Belgium le Leicester City o boleletse babegakgang.

en: He’s a good friend so it’s a real shame.
tsn: Ke tsala e e siameng, ka jalo go a swabisa.

en: He really wanted to be important for the Red Devils in this tournament.
tsn: O ne a tota a batlile go nna botlhokwa go di Red Devils mo kgaisanong eno.

en: Maybe a miracle will happen and he can come back at the end.
tsn: Gongwe motlholo o tlaa diragala mme o tlaa kgona go boela kwa bokhutlong.

en: Castagne had been chosen as Belgium’s first choice right back ahead of Thomas Meunier, who replaced him in Saturday’s match and scored Belgium’s second goal seven minutes after coming on
tsn: Castagne o ne a tlhophilwe mo maemong a ntlha a setlhopha sa Belgium, tlhopho ya ntlha kwa pele ga Thomas Meunier, yo o tseneng mo maemong a gagwe mo motshamekong wa Lamatlhatso mme a nosa nno ya bobedi ya Belgium metsotso e le supa morago ga go tsena mo lebaleng.

en: Finland emerged from the trauma of Christian Eriksen’s collapse to beat Denmark 1-0 on Saturday and they will be aiming to build on that result against Russia as they aim for a spot in the knockout stages of Euro 2020.
tsn: Finland e boetse mo motshamekong morago ga go wa gwa ga Eriksen mme ba fenya Denmark 1-0 ka Lamatlhatso, e bile ba tlaa leka go agelela mo dipholong tse kgatlhanong le Russia jaaka ba ikaelela go iponela lefelo mo dikgatong tsa peletsontle tsa Euro 2020.

en: The players returned to the pitch after Eriksen had suffered a heart attack, completing the match in very difficult circumstances, and Finland coach Markku Kanerva said his side would be happy with a draw against Russia in St Petersburg on Wednesday.
tsn: Batshameki ba ne ba boela kwa lebaleng la motshameko morago ga gore Eriksen a itemogele tlhaselo ya pelo, mme ba feleletsa motshameko ka mo tlase ga maemo a a bokete thata. Mokatisi wa kwa Finland, Markku Kanerva o rile letlhakore la gagwe le ka itumelela maleka kgatlhanong le Russia kwa St Petersburg ka Laboraro.

en: Of course, it would be a very difficult starting point to start to play for a draw.
tsn: Ee, go ka nna thata go simolola go tshamekela maleka.

en: Finland’s defence expects to have to work hard as Russia bid to bounce back from a 3-0 defeat by Belgium.
tsn: Basireletsi ba kwa Finland ba solofela go dira ka natla jaaka fa Russia e lwela go fenya morago ga go tlholwa 3-0 ke Belgium.

en: Their midfield is very dynamic, Kanerva said.
tsn: Botshamekagare jwa bona bo na le maano a le mantsi, Kanerva o buile jalo.

en: We have to do the basics better in the next match.
tsn: Re tshwanetse go dira dilo tse dinnye botoka mo nakong e e tlang.

en: We have to make sure that the passing, all the basic things are on a high level and that the players are ready to control the ball, even in tight position, he said.
tsn: Re tshwanetse go netefatsa gore go fetisa kgwele le dilo tse dingwe tse dinnye di mo maemong a a kwa godimo le gore ba ikemiseditse go laola kgwele, tota le mo maemong a a gagametseng, o buile jalo.

en: It’s a little bit of a mystery to us, how Russia will approach the game.
tsn: Re santse re sa tlhaloganye gore Russia e tlaa tsamaisa motshameko ka tsela e ntseng jang.

en: We are sure that they will press very hard from the very beginning, and we have to be skilful enough to play through that.
tsn: Re na le bonnete jwa gore ba tlaa re tsenya ka fa tlase ga kgatelelo go tloga kwa tshimologong, mme re tshwanetse go nna le bokgoni jo bo lekaneng go mekamekana le seo.

en: The Russians are bottom of Group B after the heavy loss to Belgium and Kanerva is expecting a backlash.
tsn: Russia e kwa maemong a a kwa tlase mo setlhopheng sa B morago ga tatlhegelo e e masisi kgatlhanong le Belgium mme Kanerva o solofetse thupa.

en: Russia lost 3-0 to Belgium on Saturday on home turf in St Petersburg, prompting criticism from fans and pundits.
tsn: Russia e latlhegetswe 3-0 kgatlhanong le Belgium ka Lamatlhatso kwa lebaleng la kwa gae kwa St Petersburg, mme se se dirile gore balatedi le balaketsi ba ba kgale.

en: The match highlighted the vast skill and talent gap between Belgium, the world’s top-ranked side, and Cherchesov’s team.
tsn: Motshameko o o tlhagisitse bokgoni jo bo farologaneng le talente fa gare ga Belgium, e e tseelwang kwa godimo le setlhopha sa ga Cherchesovs.

en: The criticism was deserved, Cherchesov told reporters a day before Russia face Finland in St Petersburg.
tsn: Go kgalwa go go ne go tshwanetse go diragala, Cherchesov o boleletse babegakgang letsatsi pele ga Russia e kopana le Finland kwa St Petersburg.

en: We have recovered from the first match.
tsn: Re sentse re fodile go tswa mo motshamekong wa ntlha.

en: Now we have an absolutely different kind of preparation.
tsn: Jaanong re na le mofuta o o farologaneng thata wa ipaakanyo.

en: Finland are not an easy opponent and they have already demonstrated this (against Denmark), Cherchesov said.
tsn: Finland ga e se setlhopha se se bonolo go tshameka kgatlhanong le sona e bile ba setse ba supile se (kgatlhanong le Denmark), Cherchesov o buile jalo.

en: They are a disciplined team, Dzhikiya said.
tsn: Ke setlhopha se se nang le maitshwaro a a siameng, Dzhikiya o buile jalo.

en: They are organised and play in a compact way.
tsn: Ba na le thulaganyo mme ba tshameka ka tsela e e katisegileng

en: Cherchesov said Yuri Zhirkov had injured his thigh in the match against Belgium and it was later confirmed that the defender, who turns 38 in August, would miss the rest of the tournament.
tsn: Cherchesov o rile Yuri Zhirkov o ne a gobetse mo seropeng mo motshamekong kgatlhanong le Belgium mme morago go ne ga netefadiwa gore mosireletsi yo o tshwarang dingwaga di le 38 ka kgwedi ya Phatwe yo, o tlaa fetiwa ke dikgaisano tsotlhe.

en: Given the severity of the injury, the coaching staff has decided to release the player (Zhirkov)from the team, a statement from the Russian team said on Twitter.
tsn: Ka ntlha ya kgobalo ya gagwe e e masisi, badiri ba bokatisi ba sweditse go golola motshameki (Zhirkov) go tswa mo setlhopheng, setatamente go tswa kwa setlhopheng sa Russia se buile mo Twitter.

en: An upbeat New Zealand will take on an undercooked India aiming to become test crickets first official world champions when they clash in the inaugural World Test Championship (WTC) final in Southampton from Friday.
tsn: New Zealand e e matlhagatlhaga e tlaa tshameka kgatlhanong le India e e nang le maikaelelo a go nna bommampodi ba lefatshe ba ntlha ba semmuso ba teko ya Kirikete fa ba thulana kwa dikgaisanong tsa makgaolakgang tsa lefatshe (WTC) kwa Southampton go tloga ka Labotlhano.

en: The governing International Cricket Council (ICC) wanted the championship to bring relevance and context to test cricket and New Zealand captain Kane Williamson said it had been a success.
tsn: Khansele ya boditšhabatšhaba e e laolang kirikete (ICC) e ne e batlile gore kgaisano eno ya Bomampodi e nne maleba le go dira diteko tsa Kerikete mme mokapotene wa New Zealand Kane Williamson o rile e atlegile.

en: We saw in Australia, in New Zealand, a lot of teams had a chance to get through.
tsn: Re bone Australia, New Zealand, bontsi jwa ditlhopha di na le kgono ya go fitlhelela.

en: By contrast, India have not played a test match since March and are yet to win an ICC trophy under skipper Virat Kohli.
tsn: Go ya ka pharologano, India ga e ise e tshameke motshameko wa teko fa e sale go tloga ka kgwedi ya Mopitlwe mme ba santse ba tshwanetse go fenya sekgele sa ICC ka fa tlase ga Skipper Virat Kohli

en: The importance of the WTC final was not lost on the 32-year-old.
tsn: Botlhokwa jwa motshameko wa bofelo ga bo a latlhega mo go yo o dingwaga di le 32.

en: This holds a lot of value, especially this being the first of its kind and in the toughest format, Kohli said before leaving for England.
tsn: Se se na le boleng jo bogolo thata, segolobogolo jaaka e le ya ntlha ya mofuta o, mo seemong se se thata, Kohli o buile jalo pele a leba kwa England.

en: This is like the accumulation of all the hard work of not just the duration of the championship but the last five-six years.
tsn: Se se tshwana le kokoanyo ya tiro ya ka natla, e seng fela mo pakeng ya makgaolakgang mme mo dingwageng di le 5-6 tse di fetileng

en: The ICC is happy with how the WTC generated more interest in test cricket.
tsn: Mo Lekgotla la Boditšhabatšhaba la Kerikete (ICC) le itumelela gore WTC e tlisitse kgatlhego e ntsi mo go tsa kirikete.

en: It was obvious that the interest in certain series wasn’t just restricted to the two teams involved, ICC acting CEO Geoff Allardice told a virtual news conference on Monday.
tsn: Go ne go le mo pepeneneng gore kgatlhego mo motseletseleng o o rileng e ne e se mo ditlhopheng tse pedi tse di amegang fela, CEO ya ICC ya nama o sa tshwere Geoff Allardice o boleletse kwa khonferense ya dikgang ka Mosupologo.

en: It was coming from all over the cricketing world
tsn: E ne e tswa go lefatshe la kirikete lefatshe ka bophara.

en: I think to bring that sort of context to test cricket is a real step forward.
tsn: Mme ke akanya gore go tlisa bokao jwa mofuta o mo kiriketeng ke kgato e e kwa pele.

en: Japanese officials in charge of coronavirus countermeasures will hold a news conference later on Wednesday.
tsn: Batlhankedi ba kwa Japan ba ba laolang melawana ya coronavirus, ba  tla tshwara khonferense ya dikgang moragonyana ka Laboraro.

en: Japan plans to move forward on a proposal that will allow up to 10 000 spectators or 50% of a venues capacity, whichever is smaller, at events during the Games, Kyodo News said late Tuesday, citing government sources.
tsn: Japan e ikaelela go tswelela pele ka tshitshinyo e e tla letlang babogedi ba ba fitlhang go 10 000 ka palo kgotsa 50% ya go tlala ga mafelo, nngwe le nngwe fela e e leng nnye, kwa meletlong ka nako ya metshameko, dikgang tsa Kyodo di buile jalo ka Labobedi thapama, di nopola metswedi e mengwe ya puso.

en: Foreign spectators are already prohibited from the Olympics beginning on July 23.
tsn: Babogedi ba kwa ntle ba setse ba ileditswe go ya kwa tshimologong ya diolimpiking ka di 23 tsa kgwedi ya Phukwi.

en: Organisers and government officials in Japan have said they would continue to work on coronavirus measures for a safe and secure Games, and that a decision on domestic spectators would be made this month.
tsn: Barulaganyi le batlhankedi ba mmuso kwa Japane ba rile ba tla tswelela go lebelela melawana ya coronavirus go netefatsa metshameko e e babalesegileng le e e sireletsegileng, le gore tshwetso ya babogedi e tlaa dirwa mo kgweding eno.

en: Japanese Economy Minister Yasutoshi Nishimura and the government’s top medical adviser Shigeru Omi will hold a joint news conference on Wednesday, the Cabinet Office said.
tsn: Tona ya ikonomi kwa Japan Yasutoshi Nishimura le mogakolodi yo o kwa godimo wa puso Shigeru Omi ba tla tshwara khonferense ya dikgang e e kopanetsweng ka Laboraro, kantoro ya kabinete e buile jalo.

en: Nishimura and Omi would talk about the governments coronavirus responses during the briefing on Wednesday, the Cabinet Office said, but did not provide further details and the time has yet to be decided.
tsn: Nishimura le Omi ba tlaa bua ka ga dikarabo tsa puso mabapi le coronavirus ka kopano ya bona ka Laboraro, Ofisi ya kabinete e buile jalo, mme ga e a tlamela dintlha tse dingwe le nako ga e ise e bewe.

en: Tokyo, Osaka and eight other prefectures remain under a state of emergency that is set to end on June 20.
tsn: Tokyo, Osaka le ditoropo tse dingwe di le robedi di tlaa tswelela go nna ka fa tlase ga maemo a tshoganyetso a a tla khutlang ka Seetebosigo 20.

en: It was a very difficult game but we got three goals.
tsn: E ne e le motshameko o o boima mme re iponetse dintlha di le tharo.

en: It was vital to win and start the tournament with confidence and now we want to keep on winning, said Ronaldo.
tsn: Go ne go le botlhokwa go fenya le go simolola kgaisano ka boikanyo mme jaanong re batla go tswelela ka go fenya, go bua Ronaldo.

en: Portugal coach Fernando Santos added: If wed scored earlier it would have been easier for us.
tsn: Mokatisi wa Portugal Fernando Santos o a tlaleletsa: Fa re ne re nositse kwa tshimologong, go ne go tla nna bonolo mo go rona.

en: We missed a few chances then had some anxious moments but found our composure again and finished the game well.
tsn: Re latlhegetswe ke ditšhono di le mmalwa mme ra nna le dinako tsa go tlhobaela, re kgonne go itsotsoropanya gape le go fetsa motshameko sentle.

en: Striker Adam Szalai was Hungary’s main threat, heading a free kick into the arms of Rui Patricio shortly before halftime then testing the keeper again early in the second half.
tsn: Motshamekapele Adam Szalai o ne a tshosetsa Hungary, fa a ne a latlhela kgwele ka tlhogo mo diatleng tsa ga Rui Patricio nakonyana pele ga nako ya go ikhutsa mme a leka motshwaradino gape mo halofong ya bobedi.

en: Portugal’s veteran defender Pepe nearly scored at the start of the second half but was thwarted by the ever-alert Gulacsi, who later turned away a strike from Fernandes.
tsn: Mosireletsi wa kwa Portugal yo o nang le maitemogelo, Pepe o batlile go nosa kwa tshimologong ya karolo ya bobedi mme a kgorelediwa ke Gulacsi yo o dulang a le malala a laotswe, yo morago ga moo o neng a thibela tlhaselo e e tswang kwa go Fernandes.

en: Hungary substitute Szabolcs Schon set the stadium alight in the 80th minute when his shot squirmed past Patricio but the linesman’s flag was quickly raised to puncture the celebrations.
tsn: Kemedi ya Hungary Szabolcs Schon o ne a tlisa matlhagatlhaga kwa lebaleng la metshameko mo motsotsong wa bo 80 fa thago ya gagwe e ne kgabola mo go Patricio mme rramela o ne a tsholetsa folaga ya gagwe ka bonako go emisa keteko.

en: Its ever so frustrating.
tsn: Tiragalo e kgoba marapo ka metlha.

en: We defended well, the whole team worked well and we gave it our all, said Hungary defender Attila Szalai.
tsn: Re sireleditse sentle, setlhopha sotlhe se dirile sentle mme re ntshitse bojotlhe jwa rona, go buile mosireletsi wa kwa Hungary Attila Szalai.

en: Hungary meet world champions France next back at the Puskas Arena while Portugal face Germany in Munich.
tsn: Hungary e tla kopana le bommampodi ba lefatshe ba France mo nakong e e tlang kwa Puskas Arena, fa Portugal yona e tlaa lebagana le Germany kwa Munich.

en: Hungary’s football-mad Prime Minister Viktor Orban was intent on filling the shiny new stadium, which opened in 2019, as he seeks to boost his popularity ahead of next year’s election.
tsn: Tonakgolo ya kwa Hungary e e ratang kgwele ya dinao Viktor Orban o ne a na le maikaelelo a go tlatsa lebala le le ntšhwa le le phatsimang, le le butsweng ka 2019, jaaka a batla go itsege thata pele ga ditlhopho tse di tlang.

en: Orban, who was at the game, has channelled billions of euros in state funds to upgrade an ageing football infrastructure and incurred widespread criticism for prioritising football over healthcare funds, particularly as the pandemic raged.
tsn: Orban, yo o neng a a le kwa motshamekong, o dirisitse dibilione tsa di euro tsa matlole a puso go tlhabolola didiriswa tsa kgwele ya dinao mme o ne a tshwaiwa diphoso ka go baya matlole a motshameko wa kgwele ya dinao kwa pele ga a tlhokomelo ya boitekanelo, segolobogolo jaaka leroborobo le tlhasetse.

en: While the country has weathered a second wave of coronavirus with new cases averaging 100 to 200 in the last week thanks to a rapid vaccine rollout, at one point it had the world’s highest number of COVID-19 deaths per 100,000 people based on Johns Hopkins University data.
tsn: Fa naga e sena go fenya lekhubu la bobedi la coronavirus, ka dikgetse tse dintšhwa tse di dutseng go 100 go ya go di le 200 mo bekeng e e fetileng, re leboga moento ka se, e kile ya bo e na le dipalopalo tse di kwa godimo tsa dintsho tsa COVID-19 lefatshe ka bophara, tsa batho ba le 100,000 go ya ka tshedimosetso ya kwa Unibesithi ya John Hopkins

en: Germany’s shock first round exit from the 2018 World Cup triggered an overhaul of the team.
tsn: Go tswa ga Germany mo logatong lwa ntlha lwa Sejana sa Lefatshe sa 2018 go bakile tlhabololo ya setlhopha.

en: In his final tournament before stepping down after 15 years, Loew has recalled some of the players he had axed after the disruption caused by the COVID-19 pandemic meant that the overhauled squad failed to get the desired results.
tsn: Mo kgaisanong ya gagwe ya bofelo pele a rola tiro morago ga dingwaga di le 15, Loew o ne a gopola gore go lelekiwa ga bangwe ba batshameki morago ga tlhakatlhakano e e tlhodilweng ke leroborobo la COVID- go kaya gore setlhopha se reteletswe ke go bona dipholo tse di itumedisang.

en: With 2014 world champions Thomas Mueller and Mats Hummels back in the squad after more than two years, Germany will be considered as the underdogs when their largely untested line-up face their powerful neighbours.
tsn: Jaaka bommampodi ba lefatshe Thomas Mueller le Mats Hummels ba boetse mo setlhopheng morago ga dingwaga di le pedi, Germany e  tla tsewa jaaka setlhopha se se nang le maitemogelo fa ba kopana baagisani ba bona ba ba nang le maatla.

en: What Germany will need to do first is lock down their defence against a formidable French frontline, arguably the best in the world at the moment.
tsn: Se Germany e tlaa tlhokang go se dira pele ke go tiisa tshireletso  ya bona kgatlhanong le batshameki ba kwa pele kwa France, ba ba itsegeng e le bona ba ba itlhomileng kwa pele mo lefatsheng mo nakong eno .

en: France would not have become world champions if they did not have top defenders, said Germany forward Timo Werner.
tsn: France e ka bo e se bommampodi ba lefatshe ba fa ba ne ba se na basireletsi ba maemo a a kwa godimo, Go buwa Timo Werner wa kwa Germany.

en: Players who go into the one-on-ones like NGolo Kante or Benjamin Pavard.
tsn: Batshameki ba ba lebaganang le ba bangwe ka bongwe ka bongwe jaaka NGolo Kante kgotsa Benjamin Pavard.

en: There is a reason why they are tournament favourites.
tsn: Go na le lebaka la gore goreng go na le bommamoratwa ba thonamente.

en: And then in attack the trio with (Kylian) Mbappe,(Antoine) Griezmann and (Karim) Benzema is just world class.
tsn: Mme mo go tlhaseleng boraro jo (Kylian) Mbappe, (Antoine) Griezmann le (Karim) Benzema ba kwa maemong a a kwa godimo.

en: When you have players like that in a team then it is just outstanding.
tsn: Fa o na le batshameki ba ba tshwanang le bao mo setlhopheng, go a itumedisa.

en: Benzema has recovered from a minor injury sustained in a friendly win over Bulgaria on Tuesday and is fit for their opener.
tsn: Benzema o fetsa go nna botoka morago ga kgobalo e nnye e a e boneng kwa motshamekong wa botsalano o mo go ona ba fentseng Bulgaria ka Labobedi mme o itekanetse gore a ka tshameka motshameko wa pulo.

en: We have to see what is good for us, what we need and what our strengths are, said Germany assistant coach Marcus Sorg.
tsn: Re tshwanetse go bona gore ke eng se se botlhokwa mo go rona, se re se tlhokang le gore maatla a rona a fa kae, go bua mothusa mokatisi kwa Jeremane, Marcus Sorg.

en: Secondly, we have to see how we can take the strengths of the French team out of the game.
tsn: Sa bobedi, re tshwanetse go bona gore re ka tlosa jang setlhopha sa France mo motshamekong.

en: We have to try, even against France to put our own strengths onto the pitch.
tsn: Re tshwanetse go leka, le kgatlhanong le France go tsenya maatla a rona mo lebaleng la motshameko.

en: At the end of the day it can be one single situation that could secure success for the team, Sorg said.
tsn: Kwa bokhutlong jwa letsatsi, e ka nna seemo se le sengwe se se ka sireletsang katlego ya setlhopha, Sorg o buile jalo.

en: That is why it is worth putting in the work, and our players have understood that.
tsn: Ke ka moo go leng botlhokwa gore re dire tiro ya rona, mme batshameki ba rona ba tlhalogantse seo.

en: Denmark’s Christian Eriksen said he was feeling fine under the circumstances and expressed gratitude for the flood of messages he had received after he suffered a cardiac arrest during their Euro 2020 opener on Saturday.
tsn: Christian Eriksen wa kwa Denmark a re o ikutlwa a siame mo tlase ga maemo a a leng mo go ona mme o bontshitse ditebogo ka melaetsa e a e amogetseng morago ga go itemogela bolwetse jwa pelo ka nako ya motshameko wa bona ya pulo ya Euro 2020 ka Lamatlhatso.

en: Big thanks for your sweet and amazing greetings and messages from all around the world.
tsn: Re lebogela  ditumediso le melaetsa ya lona e e monate go ralala lefatshe.

en: It means a lot to me and my family, Eriksen said in a post on the national teams Instagram profile that was posted on Tuesday.
tsn: Go kaya go le gontsi mo go nna le ba lelapa la me, Eriksen o buile jalo mo posong e e kwadilweng mo porofaeleng ya setlhopha ya bosetšhaba ya Instagram e e tswileng ka Labobedi.

en: I’m fine under the circumstances.
tsn: Ke siame ka fa tlase a maemo a.

en: The post was accompanied by a picture of the 29-year-old lying in a hospital bed, smiling and giving a thumbs up.
tsn: Poso e, e ne e tsamaya le setshwantsho sa monna yo wa dingwaga di le 29, a robetse mo bolaong kwa bookelong, a na le monyenyo mme a supa fa a siame.

en: I feel okay.
tsn: Ke ikutlwa ke siame.

en: Now, I will cheer on the boys on the Denmark team in the next matches, Play for all of Denmark, he added.
tsn: Jaanong, ke tla etleetsa basimane ba setlhopha sa Denmark mo metshamekong e e latelang. Tshamekelang Denmark yotlhe, a tlaleletsa.

en: Eriksen collapsed just before halftime in the match against Finland and was taken to hospital after receiving CPR on the pitch.
tsn: Eriksen o ile a wa pelenyana ga nako ya go ikhutsa ka nako ya motshameko wa bona kgatlhanong le Finland mme o ne a isiwa bookelong morago ga go amogela CPR mo lebaleng.

en: Yesterday, Christian Eriksen’s agent said the player was undergoing detailed examinations.
tsn: Maabane, moemedi wa ga Christian Eriksen o rile motshameki yo o santse a tlhatlhobiwa mo go tseneletseng.

en: We all want to understand what happened to him and he wants to as well.
tsn: Rotlhe re batla go itse gore go diragetse eng ka ena, le ena fela jalo.

en: The doctors are doing some detailed examinations, it will take time, Italian newspaper Gazzetta dello Sport on Monday cited Eriksens agent Martin Schoots as saying.
tsn: Dingaka di ntse di dira ditlhatlhobo tse di tseneletseng, go tla tsaya nako, kuranta ya kwa Italy, Gazzetta dello Sport ka Mosupologo e nopotse moemedi wa ga Eriksen, Martin Schoots jaaka a ne a bua.

en: Christian does not give up.
tsn: Christian ga a itlhoboge.

en: Him and his family want to send everyone their thanks.
tsn: Ene le ba lelapa la gagwe ba batla go romela ditebogo tsa bona go botlhe.

en: The Group B game was halted and eventually restarted an hour and 45 minutes later, Finland winning 1-0.
tsn: Motshameko wa setlhopha sa B o ne wa emisa mme wa tswelela gape morago ga ura le metsotso e le 45. Finland e fentse ka 1-0.

en: The incident raises questions around the workload players have been subjected to.
tsn: Tiragalo e tsosa dipotso ka ga tiro e ntsi e batshameki ba lebaneng le yona.

en: Eriksen was playing in his 66th competitive game in the one year since soccer restarted following a shutdown due to the coronavirus pandemic.
tsn: Eriksen o ne a tshameka motshameko wa gagwe wa bo 66 mo ngwageng fa e sale kgwele ya dinao e simolola morago ga go tswala ka ntlha ya leroborobo la coronavirus.

en: The messages of support for Eriksen have come pouring in, from within the game and beyond, something that Schoots said has helped cheer up the Dane.
tsn: Melaetsa ya tshegetso e e lebisitsweng kwa go Eriksen a santse e thologela, go tswa mo motshamekong le go feta, sengwe se Schoots a rileng se thusitse go mo matlafatsa.

en: He was happy because he understood how much love he has around him, Schoots added.
tsn: O ne a itumetse ka gonne o ne a tlhaloganya gore o dikaganyeditswe ke lorato lo lo kana kang, Schoots a tlaleletsa.

en: He received messages from all over the world.
tsn: O amogetse melaetsa go tswa mo lefatsheng ka bophara.

en: He was particularly struck by those from the world of Inter Milan; not just from his teammates, who he heard from through texts, but also the fans.
tsn: O ne a gapilwe maikutlo thata ke melaetsa e e tswang kwa lefatsheng la Inter Milan; E seng fela go tswa mo batshameki mmogo le ena ba a neng a bua le bona ka melaetsa, mme le balatedi.

en: Half the world has contacted us, everyone is worried.
tsn: Halofo ya lefatshe e ikgolagantse le rona, batho botlhe ba tshwenyegile.

en: Now, he just needs to rest.
tsn: Jaanong, o tshwanetse go ikhutsa.

en: His wife and parents are with him.
tsn: Mosadi wa gagwe le batsadi ba gagwe ba na le ene.

en: But in any case, he wants to support his teammates against Belgium.
tsn: Mme le fa go le jalo, o batla go tshegetsa tshameki mmogo le ena kgatlhanong le Belgium.

en: Hungary, playing in only their second European Championship in 49 years, are ranked outsiders in the tournaments toughest group but will compensate for what they lack in star names with passion and grit.
tsn: Hungary, e e tshamekang mo dikgaisanong tsa bona tsa bobedi tsa kwa Europe mo dingwageng di le 49, ba tsewa jaaka batswantle, mo setlhopheng se se thata sa thonamente mme ba tlaa ba lebatsa se ka maina a bona a dinaledi le phisego e ba nang le yona.

en: The shiny new Puska’s Arena is the only Euro 2020 stadium which will be at full capacity after local authorities agreed to exchange social distancing for a strict entry policy, requiring fans to return a negative COVID-19 test to gain access.
tsn: Lefelo le le ntšhwa le le phatsimang la Puska ke lona fela lebala la metshameko le le kgonang go tsenya batho ba bantsi morago ga gore bothati jwa selegae bo dumele go ananya katogano ya batho ka melao e e gagametseng ya go tsena, e e tlhokang gore balatedi ba fane ka teko ya COVID-19 e e se nang tshwaetsego.

en: It means the likes of Cristiano Ronaldo and Bruno Fernandes face the prospect of their every touch being booed in Tuesday’s fixture by the Budapest crowd, who will not forgive any slacking off from their side.
tsn: Go raya gore Cristiano Ronaldo le Bruno Fernandes ba ka iphitlhela ba kgalwa ke matshwititshwiti a batho ba kwa Budapest mo motshamekong wa Labobedi, ba ba se kitlang ba kgotlelela diphoso dipe go tswa mo letlhakoreng la bona.

en: They (Hungary) are a very tough team and won’t let any ball go and will never give up, said Portugal midfielder Danilo.
tsn: Ke (Hungary) setlhopha se se itekanetseng thata, se se kitlang se letla kgwele epe e tswa mo diatleng tsa bona e bile ba ka se ineele, go bua motshamekagare wa Portugal, Danilo.

en: We know what style of play to expect from them.
tsn: Re itse mokgwa wa motshameko o re tshwanetseng re o lebelele go tswa mo go bona.

en: We spent a season without playing in front of fans and were not used to it anymore but having a crowd will make the game more exciting.
tsn: Re feditse setlha sotlhe re sa tshameke mo pele ga balatedi mme ga re sa tlhola re tlwaetse, fela go nna teng ga batho go tla dira gore motshameko o nne monate.

en: Hungary will be extra motivated but it’s just another problem well have to deal with.
tsn: Hungary e tlabe e tletse matlhagatlhaga thata, mme ke nngwe ya mathata a re tlaa tshwanelang go samagana le i

en: Leaving aside the partisan crowd, Portugal are likely to face tougher tests from Germany and France and the fixture is a golden chance to clock up some early goals and points to help their push to qualify from the group.
tsn: Fa re beela kwa thoko ntwa ya batho, Portugal e tlile go lebagana le diteko tse di boima go tswa go Germany le France mme motshameko o ke tšhono e e molemo ya go iponela dintlha tse di tlaa ba thusang go tsena mo setlhopheng.

en: Portugal did face a torrid time from Hungary at Euro 2016, falling behind three times before coming back to earn a 3-3 draw and scrape into the knockout stages.
tsn: Portugal e itemogetse mathata kgatlhanong le Hungary kwa Euro 2016, fa ba ne ba salela kwa morago makgetlho a le mararo pele ga ba boa ka maleka a 3-3 mme ba  tsena mo dikgatong tsa peletsontle.

en: Fernando Santo’s Portugal side are an even stronger proposition five years on, possessing an embarrassment of attacking riches with the likes of Diogo Jota, Andre Silva, Joao Felix and Fernandes as well as the ever-determined Ronaldo.
tsn: Letlhakore la ga Fernando Santos la Portugal ke lona le le tiileng mo selekanyong sa dingwaga di le tlhano, le humile ka batlhasedi ba ba tshwanang le Diogo Jota, Andre Silva, Joao Felix le Fernandes gammogo le Ronaldo yo o dulang a ikemiseditse.

en: This is a different group, we have many young players embarking on their first major international tournament although our ambition and hunger will be the same as in Euro 2016, added 29-year-old Danilo.
tsn: Se ke setlhopha se se farologaneng, re na le batshameki ba ba botlana ba ba yang go tsenela thonamente ya bona ya ntlha ya boditšhabatšhaba, le fa e le gore phisego ya rona e santse e tlaa tshwana le ya kwa Euro 2016, go tlaleletsa Danilo wa dingwaga di le 29.

en: The previous team was very cohesive as they had been playing together for a long time while we are a young team of emerging talents but we are also a united group.
tsn: Setlhopha se se fetileng se ne se lomaganeng ka ba ne ba ntse ba tshameka mmogo mo nakong e telele. Le fa re le setlhopha se se potlana sa talente e e santseng e senoga, re setlhopha se se tshwaraganeng.

en: We all think the same and want to win.
tsn: Rotlhe re akanya ka go tshwana mme go batla go fenya.

en: Hungary, meanwhile, are a less potent side than the one which reached the knockout stage last time around, with big personalities such as Gabor Kiraly, Roland Juhasz and Zoltan Gera all moving on.
tsn: Re santse re le foo, Hungary, ga e bogale thata go tshwana le fa e ne e fitlhelela kwa kgatong ya bofelo ya peletsontle mo nakong e e fetileng, ba tshwere batho ba ba itsegeng thata jaaka Gabor Kiraly, Roland Juhasz le Zoltan Gera.

en: They are also without two key midfielders in bright young hope Dominik Szoboszlai and Zsolt Kalmar due to injury.
tsn: Gape ba latlhegetswe ke batshamekagare ba babedi ba bašwa, Dominik Szoboszlai le Zsolt Kalmar ka ntlha ya dikgobalo.

en: Asked which Portuguese player Hungary will be most concerned about on Tuesday, Rossi laughed.
tsn: Fa a bodiwa gore ke motshameki ofe wa kwa Portugal o Hungary e tla be e tshwenyegile ka ena ka Labobedi, Rossi o ne a tshega.

en: I could almost list the entire squad, he told reporters.
tsn: Nka bala batshameki ba botlhe, o ne a bolelela babegakgape.

en: Naming one player would be a disservice to the others.
tsn: Fa ke ntsha leina le le lengwe fela ke tla be ke sa direle ba bangwe sentle.

en: They have huge potential in all areas of the pitch.
tsn: Ba na le bokgoni jo bontsi mo dikarolong tsotlhe tsa lebala..

en: We need to help one another out, we need to make sure were very compact, and close down the space between the lines.
tsn: Re tlhoka go thusana, re tshwanetse go netefatsa gore re mmogo, mme re tswale diphatlha fa gare ga mela.

en: Hungary rely on a robust defence and counter-attacks.
tsn: Hungary e ikaegile thata mo tshireletsong e e popota le tlhaselo.

en: Fewer big names in their squad means the team may be fresher than opponents who have played full seasons in big domestic and international tournaments.
tsn: Maina a le mantsi a a sa tlwaelegang mo setlhopheng a kaya gore setlhopha se tla be se le matlhagatlhaga go feta se ba tshamekang kgatlhanong le sona, se se tshamekileng mo dithonamenteng tsa selegae le tsa boditšhabatšhaba.

en: Bundesliga stalwarts like Leipzig goalkeeper Peter Gulacsi do play for Hungary, tough opponents even without their most valuable player, Dominik Szoboszlai.
tsn: Bagaka ba Bundesliga ba ba tshwanang le motshwaradino wa Leipzig e leng Peter Gulacsi ba tshamekela Hungary, ke batshameki ba ba popota le kwa ntle ga motshameki wa bona yo o tlhwatlhwa, Dominik Szoboszlai.

en: We need to execute our strategy, especially on defence, because this Portuguese team is stronger even than the 2016 one, he said.
tsn: Re tshwanetse go diragatsa togamaano ya rona, bogolosegolo mo tshireletsong, ka gonne setlhopha se sa kwa Portugal se matlafetse le feta sa ngwaga wa 2016, o buile  jalo.

en: Hungary and Portugal played one of the most exciting group matches at Euro 2016, with Hungary leading three times and Portugal equalising on each occasion including two goals by Cristiano Ronaldo.
tsn: Hungary le Portugal di tshamekile mengwe ya metshameko ya setlhopha e e itumedisang thata kwa Euro 2016, kwa Hungary e neng e itlhomile kwa pele makgetlo a le mararo mme Portugal e lekanya dino lekgetlho lengwe lengwe, go akaretsa le dino di le pedi tse di nositsweng ke Cristiano Ronaldo.

en: Hungary finished top of the group before losing 4-0 to Belgium in the round of 16 while Portugal won the title.
tsn: Hungary e ne e itlhomile kwa pele mo setlhopheng pele ga go latlhegelwa ka 4-0 kgatlhanong le Belgium mo karolong ya 16 fa Portugal yona e ikgapetse sekgele.

en: Eight teams will qualify for the following season’s Champions Cup.
tsn: Ditlhopha di le robedi di tlaa tsenela dikgaisano tsa sekgele mo setlheng se se latelang.
